 19096                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19097                                  ;		error_sharing_violation

 19099                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed

 19123                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS,

 19507                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19508                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 19510                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 19511

 19513                                  %else

 19516                                  %endif

 19519                                  ; Check if the source is a directory of file. If directory rename it to the
 19520                                  ; the new name in the Fastopen cache buffer. If file name it has been
 19521                                  ; previously deleted.
 19522                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19523                                  
 19524                                  ;yesdirty2:	; 31/01/2024
 19525                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 19527 00002EAE C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;;BN00XPTM. chek if source a dir ;AN000;

 19533

 19535                                  	;call	FastOpen_Rename		;;BN00X rename dir entry in fastopen
 19536                                  	
 19537                                  	; 31/01/2024
 19538                                  	;POP	SI
 19539                                  	;JMP	SHORT NOT_DIRTY1
 19540                                  NOT_DIR2:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19541 00002EBB 5E                      	POP	SI
 19542                                  NOT_DIRTY1:				;;BN00X
 19543                                  NEXT_SOURCE:

 19548                                  ; to enter it before going to RENAME_Next.

 19623                                  ;Procedure: NEW_RENAME
 19624                                  ;
 19625                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19626                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 19627                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 19628                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 19629                                  ;	   put in destination string
 19630                                  ;Output: ES:DI-> new string
 19631                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19632                                  
 19633                                  NEW_RENAME:
 19634                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19635                                  NEWNAM:
 19636                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19637 00002F08 AC                      	LODSB
 19638 00002F09 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?" ; 3Fh
 19639 00002F0B 7502                    	JNZ	short NOCHG
 19640 00002F0D 8A07                    	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 19641                                  NOCHG:
 19642 00002F0F AA                      	STOSB
 19643 00002F10 43                      	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 19644 00002F11 E2F5                    	LOOP	NEWNAM
 19645                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19646                                  gs_ret_label:	; 18/12/2022
 19647 00002F13 C3                      	retn

 19666                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.

 19668                                  
 19669                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19670                                  
 19671                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19672                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19673                                  ;
 19674                                  ; Inputs:
 19675                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19676                                  ;		terminated)
 19677                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19678                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19679                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19680                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19681                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19682                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19683                                  ; Function:
 19684                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19685                                  ; Returns:
 19686                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19687                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19688                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19689                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19690                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19691                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19692                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19693                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19694                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19695                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19696                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19697                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19698                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19699                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19700                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19701                                  
 19702                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19703                                  
 19704                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 19705                                  
 19706                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 19707                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19708                                  
 19709 00002F14 E8EFE8                  	call	TestNet
 19710 00002F17 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 19711                                  
 19712                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19713                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 19714                                  ;ELSE
 19715                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 19716                                  ;	INT	2FH
 19717                                  ;	return
 19718                                  
 19719 00002F19 B80F11                  	mov     ax, 110Fh
 19720 00002F1C CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19721                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19722                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19723                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = file attributes
 19724 00002F1E C3                      	retn
 19725                                  ;ENDIF

 19740 00002F2A 7312                    	JNC	short info_check_dev

 19743 00002F2E 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 19744 00002F30 7407                    	JZ	short bad_path1

 19762                                  
 19763                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 19765                                  ; If root dir then CurBuf == -1. Check for this case and return subdir attr
 19766                                  ;for a root dir

 19770

 19775                                  	; (DOSCODE:683Eh)
 19776                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19777                                  	;clc

 19779                                  
 19780                                  not_root:
 19781                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19782 00002F4F 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 19783 00002F50 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 19784 00002F54 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19785 00002F56 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			; Assume size=0 (dir)
 19786 00002F58 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19787                                  	;mov	cx,[si+16h]

 19801                                  NO_SIZE:
 19802 00002F6F 1F                      	POP	DS
 19803                                  	;CLC
 19804                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19805                                  	; (DOSCODE:6864h)
 19806                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19807                                  	;clc
 19808 00002F70 EBC4                    	jmp	short JustRet

 19810                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 19811                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19812                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19813                                  ; Inputs:
 19814                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19815                                  ;		terminated)
 19816                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19817                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19818                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19819                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19820                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19821                                  ;	[SATTRIB] is attribute of search (determines what files may be found)
 19822                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 19823                                  ; Function:
 19824                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 19825                                  ; Returns:
 19826                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19827                                  ;	    No error
 19828                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19829                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19830                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19831                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19832                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19833                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19834                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19835                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19836                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19837                                  ;			Attempt to set an attribute which cannot be set
 19838                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 19839                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19840                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 19841                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 19842                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 19843                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19844                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19845                                  
 19846                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19847                                  
 19848                                  SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE:
 19849                                  
 19850                                  ;hkn; set_file_attr is called from file.asm. DS has been set 
 19851                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19852

 19854 00002F75 7412                    	JZ	short set_look
 19855                                  _BAD_ACC:

 19864 00002F84 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied ; 5

 19866 00002F88 C3                      	retn

 19882                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file

 19898 00002FA5 EB85                    	JMP	short NO_PATH
 19899

 19901                                  cannot_set_root:			; M025:
 19902 00002FA7 B80500                  	mov	ax,error_access_denied	; M025: return error is attempting
 19903                                  	;stc				; M025: to set attr. of root
 19904                                  	;jmp	short OK_BYE		; M025:

 19932 00002FD1 2608470B                	OR	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],AL

 19935                                  %if 0
 19936                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 19948                                  %endif

 19975                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 19977                                  
 19978                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 19979                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 19980                                  ;
 19981                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 19982                                  ;
 19983                                  ;	Modification history:
 19984                                  ;
 19985                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19986                                  
 19987                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 19988                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19989                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 19990                                  ;
 19991                                  ; Inputs:
 19992                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 19993                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 19994                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 19995                                  ; Function:
 19996                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 19997                                  ; Returns:
 19998                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 19999                                  ;    Carry clear
 20000                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20001                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20002                                  ; NOTE:
 20003                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20004                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20005                                  ;	that time.
 20006                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20007                                  
 20008                                  DOS_DUP:
 20009                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20010                                  
 20011                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20012 00002FE6 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20013 00002FEB 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20014                                  
 20015                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20016                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20017 00002FF0 E82CE8                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20018 00002FF3 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20019 00002FF5 E8FE1E                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20020                                  DO_INC:
 20021                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20022 00002FF8 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20023                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20024 00002FFB C3                      	retn
 20025

 20027                                  ; CREATE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 20032                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20033                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20035                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20036                                  ;
 20037                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20038                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20039                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20040                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20041                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20042                                  ;
 20043                                  ;	Revision history:
 20044                                  ;
 20045                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20046                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20047                                  
 20048                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20049                                  
 20050                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20051                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20052                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20053                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20054                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20055                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20056                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20057                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20058                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20059                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20060                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20061                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20062                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20063                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20064                                  
 20065                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20066                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20067                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20068                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20069                                  ;
 20070                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20071                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20072                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20073                                  ;			terminated)
 20074                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20075                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20076                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20077                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20078                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20079                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20080                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20081                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20082                                  ;
 20083                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20084                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20085                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20086                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20087                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20088                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20089                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20090                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20091                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20092                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20093                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20094                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20095                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20096                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20097                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20098                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20099                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20101                                  
 20102                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20103                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20104                                  
 20105                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20106                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20107                                  
 20108                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20109                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20110                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20111                                  
 20112                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20113                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20114                                  
 20115 00002FFC 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 20116                                  
 20117                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 20118                                  ;
 20119                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 20120                                  
 20121                                  Create_inter:
 20122 00002FFE A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 20123                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 20124 00003000 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 20125 00003002 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 20126 00003004 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 20127                                  	
 20128                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20129                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20130 00003006 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 20131                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20132                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 20133                                  	
 20134 0000300B B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 20135                                  NoReset:
 20136 0000300D 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20h
 20137 0000300F A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 20138 00003011 7408                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 20139                                  AttErr:
 20140 00003013 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 20141                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 20142                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20143 00003016 E8A1E2                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 20144 00003019 EB62                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 20145                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 20146                                  ATT_OK:
 20147 0000301B C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20148 0000301F 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20149 00003020 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20150 00003024 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20151 00003027 751B                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 20152                                  
 20153                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 20154                                  
 20155 00003029 07                      	POP	ES
 20156                                  
 20157                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20158                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20159                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 20160 0000302A F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20161 0000302F 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20162                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 20163 00003031 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 20164                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 20165 00003032 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 20166                                  NOEXTOP2:	; 01/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20167 00003035 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 20168 00003037 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 20169 00003038 C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.
 20170 0000303D C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
 20171                                  NOEXTOP:				    ;AN000;
 20172                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20173                                  
 20174                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20175                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_CREATE
 20176                                  ;ELSE
 20177 0000303E 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20178                                  
 20179                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 24
 20180                                  	;INT	2FH
 20181                                  
 20182 0000303F B81811                  	mov     ax,1118h
 20183                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20184                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE FILE
 20185                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20186                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 20187                                  			; STACK: WORD file creation mode???
 20188                                  
 20189                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20190                                  	;retn
 20191 00003042 EBF1                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20192                                  ;ENDIF
 20193                                  
 20194                                  ;	We have a CDS. See if it's network
 20195                                  
 20196                                  TEST_RE_NET:
 20197                                  	;;test	word [es:si+43h],8000h
 20198                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 20199                                  	; 07/12/2022
 20200                                  	;test	byte [es:si+44h],80h
 20201                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20202 00003044 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 20203 00003049 07                      	POP	ES
 20204 0000304A 7417                    	JZ	short LOCAL_CREATE
 20205                                  
 20206                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20207 0000304C E8C700                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode		    ;AN000;EO.
 20208 0000304F 7205                    	JC	SHORT dochk		    ;AN000;EO.
 20209                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 20210                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 20211                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20212 00003051 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both ;IFS.
 20213                                  
 20214                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20215                                  dochk:
 20216 00003056 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20217 0000305B 75D4                    	JNZ	short IFS_extopen	    ;AN000;EO. yes, issue extended open
 20218                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20219                                  
 20220                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20221                                  ;	transfer NET_CREATE
 20222                                  ;ELSE
 20223 0000305D 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20224                                  	
 20225                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 23
 20226                                  	;INT	2FH
 20227                                  	
 20228 0000305E B81711                  	mov     ax,1117h
 20229                                  	
 20230                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20231                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE REMOTE FILE
 20232                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20233                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 20234                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 20235                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 20236                                  
 20237                                  	;POP	BX			; BX is trashed anyway
 20238                                  ;nomore:
 20239                                  	;retn
 20240 00003061 EBD2                    	jmp	short NOEXTOP2 ; 01/02/2024
 20241                                  ;ENDIF
 20242                                  
 20243                                  ;**	It's a local create. We have a local CDS for it.
 20244                                  
 20245                                  LOCAL_CREATE:
 20246                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20247 00003063 E8B000                  	CALL	Set_EXT_mode	;AN000;EO. set mode if from extended open
 20248 00003066 7205                    	JC	short setdone	;AN000;EO.
 20249                                  	
 20250                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20251                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20252                                  	;;or	word [es:di+2],2
 20253                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 20254                                  	;or	byte [es:di+2],2
 20255 00003068 26804D0202              	or	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 20256                                  setdone:
 20257 0000306D E813E8                  	call	ECritDisk
 20258 00003070 E8B920                  	call	MakeNode
 20259 00003073 7317                    	JNC	short Create_ok
 20260 00003075 C606[A10A]FF            	mov	byte [VOLCHNG_FLAG],-1	; indicate no change in volume label
 20261 0000307A E833E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 20262                                  
 20263                                  	;entry	SET_MKND_ERR
 20264                                  SET_MKND_ERR:
 20265                                  
 20266                                  ;	Looks up MakeNode errors and converts them. AL is MakeNode
 20267                                  ;	error, SI is GETPATH bad spot return if path_not_found error.
 20268                                  
 20269                                  ;hkn; CRTERRTAB is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE)
 20270 0000307D BB[8430]                	MOV     BX,CRTERRTAB
 20271                                  	;XLAT  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20272                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20273 00003080 2E                      	CS
 20274 00003081 D7                      	XLAT
 20275                                  CreatBadRet:
 20276 00003082 F9                      	STC
 20277 00003083 C3                      	retn
 20278                                  
 20279                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20280                                  ; DOSCODE:69C4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20282                                  
 20283                                  ;** Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20284                                  
 20285                                  ; 17/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20286                                  ; Offset 12B1h of IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987
 20287                                  
 20288                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 19/07/2018 - MSDOS 3.3	
 20289                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h
 20290                                  
 20291                                  ;CRTERRTAB: ; 18/05/2019 - MSDOS 6.0	
 20292                                  ;	db	0,5,52h,50h,3,5,20h,2
 20293                                  
 20294                                  ; 08/08/2018
 20295                                  
 20296                                  CRTERRTAB:	;LABEL BYTE	; Lookup table for MakeNode returns
 20297 00003084 00                      	DB	0			; none
 20298 00003085 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 20299 00003086 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20300 00003087 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20301 00003088 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 20302 00003089 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 20303 0000308A 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 20304                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20305 0000308B 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7
 20306                                  
 20307                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20308                                  
 20309                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 20310                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 20311                                  ; file to the current size.
 20312                                  
 20313                                  ; If we created a volume id on the diskette, set the VOLCHNG_FLAG to logical
 20314                                  ; drive number to force a Build BPB after Media Check.
 20315                                  
 20316                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 20317                                  Create_ok:
 20318                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20319                                  	;call	FastOpen_Delete
 20320                                  ;;; FASTOPEN 8/29/86
 20321 0000308C A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 20322 0000308F A808                    	test	al,attr_volume_id
 20323 00003091 741C                    	jz	short NoVolLabel
 20324 00003093 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 20325                                  	;mov	ah,[ES:DI+curdir.text]	; get drive letter
 20326 00003097 268A25                  	mov	ah,[ES:DI] ; 09/08/2018
 20327 0000309A 80EC41                  	sub	ah,'A'	; 41h		; convert to drive number
 20328 0000309D 8826[A10A]              	mov	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],ah	;Set flag to indicate volid change
 20329                                  	
 20330                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20331                                  
 20332                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20333 000030A1 B701                    	MOV	BH,1			;AN000;>32mb set volume id to boot record
 20334 000030A3 E81F00                  	CALL	Set_Media_ID		;AN000;>32mb
 20335                                  	
 20336 000030A6 E8DAE7                  	call	ECritDisk
 20337 000030A9 E85431                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; force a media check
 20338 000030AC E801E8                  	call	LCritDisk
 20339                                  
 20340                                  NoVolLabel:
 20341 000030AF B80200                  	MOV	ax,2
 20342 000030B2 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20343                                  ;if installed
 20344                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 20345 000030B6 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)] ; 14 = ShSU
 20346                                  ;else
 20347                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 20348                                  ;endif
 20349 000030BA E8F3E7                  	call	LCritDisk
 20350 000030BD E94501                  	jmp	SET_SFT_MODE
 20351                                  
 20352                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20353                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20354                                  ;
 20355                                  ; Inputs:
 20356                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20357                                  ;		terminated)
 20358                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20359                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20360                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20361                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20362                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20363                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20364                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20365                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20366                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20367                                  ; Function:
 20368                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20369                                  ; Outputs:
 20370                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20371                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20372                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20373                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20374                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20375                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20376                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20377                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20378                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20379                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20380                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20381                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20382                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20383                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20384                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20385                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20386                                  
 20387                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20388 000030C0 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20389 000030C2 E939FF                  	JMP	Create_inter
 20390                                  
 20391                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20392                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20393                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 20394                                  ;
 20395                                  ; Inputs:
 20396                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 20397                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 20398                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 20399                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP
 20400                                  ; Function:
 20401                                  ;	Set Volume ID to DOS 4.00 Boot record.
 20402                                  ; Outputs:
 20403                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20404                                  ;	    volume id set
 20405                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20406                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20407                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20408                                  
 20409                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20410                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20411                                  Set_Media_ID:
 20412 000030C5 50                      	PUSH	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20413 000030C6 06                      	PUSH	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 20414 000030C7 57                      	PUSH	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 20415                                  
 20416 000030C8 FEC4                    	INC	AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive #
 20417 000030CA 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive # (A=1,B=2,,,)
 20418 000030CC B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb  generic IOCTL
 20419                                  	;MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id
 20420                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20421                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20422 000030CE B96648                  	mov	cx,4866h	; ch = FAT32 disk drive (CATEGORY CODE)
 20423                                  				; cl = minor code,
 20424                                  				;      get volume serial number (and name)
 20425                                  
 20426                                  ;hkn; PACKET_TEMP is in DOSDATA
 20427 000030D1 BA[A00D]                	MOV	DX,Packet_Temp	;AN000;>32mb
 20428                                  
 20429                                  Set_Media_ID_1:
 20430                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20431 000030D4 51                      	push	cx
 20432                                  
 20433 000030D5 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20434 000030D6 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20435 000030D7 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20436                                  
 20437                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 20438 000030D9 E849F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20439                                  
 20440 000030DC 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20441 000030DD 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20442                                  
 20443                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20444 000030DE 59                      	pop	cx
 20445                                  	;JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 20446 000030DF 730A                    	jnc	short Set_Media_ID_2
 20447 000030E1 80FD48                  	cmp	ch,48h		; is it FAT32 disk drive request?
 20448 000030E4 F9                      	stc
 20449 000030E5 7529                    	jne	short geterr	; (ch=8 request failed!)
 20450 000030E7 B508                    	mov	ch,8		; set category code for (old) FAT disk drive
 20451                                  				; (except FAT32)
 20452 000030E9 EBE9                    	jmp     short Set_Media_ID_1 ; and try again
 20453                                  
 20454                                  Set_Media_ID_2:
 20455 000030EB 08FF                    	OR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb delete volume id
 20456 000030ED 7405                    	JZ	short NoName	;AN000;>32mb yes
 20457                                  
 20458                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 20459 000030EF BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1	;AN000;>32mb
 20460                                  
 20461 000030F2 EB03                    	JMP	SHORT doset	;AN000;>32mb yes
 20462                                  NoName: 			;AN000;
 20463                                  
 20464                                  ;hkn; NO_NAME_ID is in DOSDATA
 20465 000030F4 BE[C10D]                	MOV	SI,NO_NAME_ID	;AN000;>32mb
 20466                                  
 20467                                  doset:				;AN000;
 20468 000030F7 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX		;AN000;;>32mb

 20471

 20473                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet

 20475

 20477

 20541                                  ;============================================================================
 20542                                  ; OPEN.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20543                                  ;============================================================================
 20544                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20545                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20546                                  
 20547                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 20548                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 20549                                  
 20550                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 20551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20552                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 20553                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 20554                                  ;
 20555                                  ;	DOS_Open
 20556                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 20557                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 20558                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 20559                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 20560                                  ;
 20561                                  ;	Revision history:
 20562                                  ;
 20563                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20564                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 20565                                  ;
 20566                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 20567                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 20568                                  ;
 20569                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 20570                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 20571                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 20572                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 20573                                  ;	       else do not.
 20574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 20575                                  
 20576                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20577                                  
 20578                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 20579                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20580                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20581                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 20582                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 20583                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 20584                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 20585                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 20586                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 20587                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 20588                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 20589                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20590                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20591                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20592                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20593                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20594                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20595                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20596                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20597                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20598                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20599                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 20600                                  ;
 20601                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 20602                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 20603                                  
 20604                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 20605                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20606                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 20607                                  ;
 20608                                  ; Inputs:
 20609                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20610                                  ;		terminated)
 20611                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20612                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20613                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20614                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20615                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20616                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 20617                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20618                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20619                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 20620                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20621                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20622                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20623                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20624                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20625                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20626                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20627                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20628                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20629                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20630                                  ;
 20631                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20632                                  ;		(not checked)
 20633                                  ; Function:
 20634                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 20635                                  ; Outputs:
 20636                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20637                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20638                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20639                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20640                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20641                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20642                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20643                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20644                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20645                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20646                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20647                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 20648                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 20649                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20650                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 20651                                  ;			open a directory
 20652                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20653                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20654                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 20655                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20657                                  
 20658                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20659                                  ; DOSCODE:6A60h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20660                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20661                                  ; DOSCODE:6A4Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20662                                  
 20663                                  ; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20664                                  ; DOSCODE:71BBh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20665                                  
 20666                                  DOS_OPEN:
 20667                                  	; DS has been set up to DOSDATA in file.asm and fcbio2.asm. 
 20668                                  
 20669 0000312A C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 20670 0000312F E82201                  	CALL	Check_Access_AX
 20671 00003132 722B                    	JC	short do_ret_label	    ; retc
 20672                                  
 20673 00003134 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20674 00003138 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 20675                                  
 20676                                  	; sleaze! move only access/sharing mode in. Leave sf_isFCB unchanged
 20677                                  
 20678 0000313A 26884502                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AL ; For moment do this on FCBs too
 20679 0000313E 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20680 0000313F C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20681                                  	; 18/08/2018
 20682 00003143 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 20683 00003146 7530                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET1
 20684 00003148 07                      	POP	ES
 20685                                  
 20686                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20687                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20688 00003149 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 20689 0000314E 7410                    	JZ	short _NOEXTOP 		    ;FT. no, do normal			;AN000;
 20690                                  _IFS_extopen:									;AN000;
 20691 00003150 A0[0106]                	MOV	AL,[SAVE_BX]		    ; M034 - save_bx has original bx  
 20692                                  					    ; with which call was made. This
 20693                                  					    ; has the open access bits. 
 20694                                  	;;MOV	AL,[SAVE_CX]		    ; M034 - FT. al= create attribute
 20695                                  	
 20696 00003153 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;FT. pass create attr to IFS	;AN000;
 20697                                  	;mov	ax,112Eh
 20698                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;FT. issue extended open verb	;AN000;
 20699 00003154 B82E11                  	mov	ax,(MultNET*256)+46 
 20700 00003157 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20701 00003159 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;FT. trash bx			;AN000;
 20702 0000315A C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20703                                  
 20704                                  do_ret_label:
 20705 0000315F C3                      	retn				    ;FT.				;AN000;
 20706                                  _NOEXTOP:
 20707                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20708                                  	;
 20709                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20710                                  	;transfer NET_SEQ_OPEN
 20711                                  ;ELSE
 20712                                  	
 20713                                  do_net_int2f:
 20714 00003160 F606[8600]01            	test	byte [DOS_FLAG],EXECOPEN ; Q: was this open call made from exec
 20715 00003165 7409                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20716                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware
 20717                                  					;    of this 
 20718                                  	
 20719                                  					; M042 - start
 20720                                  	;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],EXEC_AWARE_REDIR ; 800h
 20721 00003167 F606[1206]08            	test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],(EXEC_AWARE_REDIR>>8)
 20722                                  					; Q: does this redir know how to 
 20723                                  					;    this
 20724 0000316C 7402                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 20725                                  					; Y: set bit 3 of access byte and 
 20726                                  					;    set sharing mode to DENY_WRITE
 20727                                  					; M042 - end
 20728                                  	
 20729                                  	; NOTE: This specific mode has not been set for the code assembled
 20730                                  	; under the "NOT Installed" conditional. Currently Installed is 
 20731                                  	; always one.
 20732                                  					; M035 - set the bits on the stack
 20733                                  	;mov	al,23h
 20734 0000316E B023                    	mov	AL,SHARING_DENY_WRITE+EXEC_OPEN
 20735                                  	
 20736                                  not_exec_open:
 20737                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20738 00003170 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20739                                  
 20740                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 22
 20741                                  	;INT	2FH
 20742                                  
 20743 00003171 B81611                  	mov     ax,1116h
 20744 00003174 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - OPEN EXISTING REMOTE FILE
 20745                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20746                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 20747                                  			; STACK: WORD file open mode
 20748                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 20749                                  
 20750 00003176 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 20751                                  ;do_ret_label: ; 09/08/2018
 20752 00003177 C3                      	retn
 20753                                  ;ENDIF
 20754                                  
 20755                                  TEST_RE_NET1:
 20756                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 20757                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20758 00003178 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 20759 0000317D 07                      	POP	ES
 20760                                  	; 18/05/2019
 20761 0000317E 7409                    	JZ	short LOCAL_OPEN
 20762                                  
 20763                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20764                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20765 00003180 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open	;AN000;
 20766 00003185 75C9                    	JNZ	short _IFS_extopen	      ;FT. issue extended open	;AN000;
 20767                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20768                                  
 20769                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20770                                  ;	transfer NET_OPEN
 20771                                  ;ELSE
 20772 00003187 EBD7                    	jmp	short do_net_int2f
 20773                                  ;ENDIF
 20774                                  
 20775                                  LOCAL_OPEN:
 20776                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20777 00003189 E8F7E6                  	call	ECritDisk
 20778                                  
 20779                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 20780                                  
 20781                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20782                                  	;;or	byte [FastOpenFlg],5
 20783                                  	;OR	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set+Special_Fill_Set ; only open can
 20784                                  
 20785 0000318C E83418                  	call	GETPATH
 20786                                  
 20787                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/16/86
 20788                                  
 20789 0000318F 7317                    	JNC	short Open_found
 20790 00003191 750B                    	JNZ	short bad_path2
 20791 00003193 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 20792 00003195 7407                    	JZ	short bad_path2
 20793                                  OpenFNF:
 20794 00003197 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found	; 2
 20795                                  OpenBadRet:
 20796                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA use SS override
 20797                                  	; 12/08/2018
 20798                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FastOpenFlg],0 ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) offset 36CAh
 20799                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20800                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20801                                  	;AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes    ;; DOS 3.3
 20802                                  	
 20803 0000319A F9                      	STC
 20804                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20805                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20806 0000319B E912E7                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20807                                  
 20808                                  bad_path2:
 20809 0000319E B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found	; 3
 20810 000031A1 EBF7                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 20811                                  
 20812                                  Open_Bad_Access:
 20813 000031A3 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; 5
 20814 000031A6 EBF2                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 20815                                  
 20816                                  Open_found:
 20817 000031A8 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 20818 000031AA 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 20819 000031AC 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 20820 000031AE 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 20821                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 20822 000031B2 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 20823 000031B6 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 20824 000031B8 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 20825 000031BA A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 20826 000031BC 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 20827                                  
 20828                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 20829                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 20830                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 20831                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 20832                                  ;
 20833                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 20834                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 20835                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 20836                                  
 20837 000031BE 1E                      	push	ds
 20838 000031BF 56                      	push	si
 20839 000031C0 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 20840                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 20841 000031C4 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 20842                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20843                                  	;test	ch,80h
 20844 000031C7 F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 20845                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 20846 000031CA 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 20847 000031CC 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 20848 000031CE 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 20849 000031D1 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 20850 000031D4 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 20851                                  ResetAccess:
 20852                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 20853                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 20854                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20855                                  	;and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 20856                                  	;;;
 20857                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20858                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20859                                  	;and	cx,0FFFCh
 20860 000031D6 80E1FC                  	and	cl,0FCh ; ~3 ; ~open_mode_mask ; clear access
 20861                                  	;;;
 20862                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 20863 000031D9 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 20864 000031DC EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 20865                                  
 20866                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 20867                                  
 20868                                  NormalOpen:
 20869                                  	;AND	CL,access_mask	; 0Fh	; remove extras
 20870                                  	;;;
 20871                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20872                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20873 000031DE 80E103                  	and     cl,3		; it was 'and cl,0Fh' in MSDOS 6.22
 20874                                  				; (and cl,access_mask)
 20875                                  				; this may be open_mode_mask
 20876                                  	;;;
 20877 000031E1 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 20878 000031E4 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT	; yes
 20879 000031E6 5E                      	pop	si
 20880 000031E7 1F                      	pop	ds
 20881 000031E8 EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 20882                                  ;
 20883                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 20884                                  ;
 20885                                  FillSFT:
 20886 000031EA 5E                      	pop	si
 20887 000031EB 1F                      	pop	ds
 20888                                  open_ok:
 20889 000031EC E8E520                  	call	DOOPEN			; Fill in SFT
 20890                                  
 20891                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA. use SS override
 20892                                  	; 18/05/2019
 20893                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlag],80h
 20894                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 20895                                  	;AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	;; DOS 3.3
 20896                                  	; 12/08/2018
 20897                                  	;and	byte [FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	
 20898                                  
 20899                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20900 000031EF E84300                  	CALL	DO_SHARE_CHECK
 20901 000031F2 7303                    	JNC	short SHARE_OK
 20902                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 20903                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20904 000031F4 E9B9E6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 20905                                  
 20906                                  SHARE_OK:
 20907                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 20908 000031F7 B80300                  	MOV	AX,3
 20909 000031FA C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20910                                  ;if installed
 20911                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 20912 000031FE FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]  ; 14 = ShSU
 20913                                  ;else
 20914                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 20915                                  ;endif
 20916 00003202 E8ABE6                  	call	LCritDisk
 20917                                  	
 20918                                  	;FallThru Set_SFT_Mode
 20919                                  
 20920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20921                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_SFT_MODE
 20922                                  ;
 20923                                  ; Finish SFT initialization for new reference. Set the correct mode.
 20924                                  ;
 20925                                  ;   Inputs:
 20926                                  ;	ThisSFT points to SFT
 20927                                  ;
 20928                                  ;   Outputs:
 20929                                  ;	Carry clear
 20930                                  ;   Registers modified: AX.
 20931                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20932                                  
 20933                                  ;hkn; called from create. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 20934                                  
 20935                                  SET_SFT_MODE:
 20936 00003205 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]

 20951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20952                                  ; Procedure Name : SHARE_ERROR
 20953                                  ;
 20954                                  ; Called on sharing violations. ES:DI points to SFT. AX has error code
 20955                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 20956                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 20957                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved
 20958                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 20961                                  	; 17/12/2022
 20962                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h

 20964                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; 8000h
 20965 00003220 7509                    	JNZ	short _HARD_ERR

 20979 00003234 C3                      	retn

 20981                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20983                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 20984                                  ;
 20985                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 20986                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 20987                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 20988                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok
 20989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20990                                  
 20991                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20992                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 20993 00003235 E84BE6                  	call	ECritDisk		; enter critical section
 20994                                  OPN_RETRY:
 20995 00003238 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 20996                                  OpenShareRetry:
 20997 0000323C 51                      	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 20998 0000323D E88B4E                  	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 20999 00003240 59                      	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 21000 00003241 730E                    	JNC	short Share_Ok2		; No problem with access
 21001 00003243 E87BE5                  	call	Idle
 21002 00003246 E2F4                    	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 21003                                  OpenShareFail:
 21004 00003248 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21005 0000324C E8CCFF                  	call	SHARE_ERROR
 21006 0000324F 73E7                    	JNC	short OPN_RETRY		; User wants more retry
 21007                                  Share_Ok2:
 21008                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; leave critical section
 21009                                  	;retn
 21010                                  	; 18/12/2022
 21011 00003251 E95CE6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
