 21013                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21014                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 21015                                  ;
 21016                                  ; Inputs:
 21017                                  ;	AX is mode
 21018                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 21019                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 21020                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 21021                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 21022                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 21023                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 21024                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 21025                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 21026                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 21027                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 21028                                  ; Function:
 21029                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 21030                                  ; Outputs:
 21031                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 21032                                  ;	Carry Clear
 21033                                  ;		Mode is correct
 21034                                  ;		AX unchanged
 21035                                  ;	Carry Set
 21036                                  ;		Mode is bad
 21037                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 21038                                  ; No other registers effected
 21039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21040                                  
 21041                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21042                                  Check_Access_AX:
 21043 00003254 A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 21044 00003257 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21045                                  
 21046                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 21047                                  
 21048 00003258 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21049 0000325A 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 21050                                  
 21051                                  	;CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 21052                                  	;JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21053                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21054                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21055 0000325D 803E[7205]00            	cmp	byte [FSHARING],0
 21056 00003262 7405                    	jz	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21057                                  
 21058 00003264 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h
 21059 00003267 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 21060                                  CheckShareMode:
 21061 00003269 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 21062 0000326C 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21063                                  CheckAccessMode:
 21064 0000326E 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21065                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21066 00003270 80E303                  	and	bl,3 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM	
 21067                                  	;AND	BL,access_mask ; 0Fh
 21068 00003273 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 21069 00003276 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21070 00003278 5B                      	POP	BX
 21071 00003279 F8                      	CLC
 21072 0000327A C3                      	retn
 21073                                  
 21074                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 21075 0000327B B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 21076 0000327E 5B                      	POP	BX
 21077 0000327F F9                      	STC
 21078 00003280 C3                      	retn

 21080                                  ;============================================================================
 21081                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21082                                  ;============================================================================
 21083                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21084                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21085                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21086                                  
 21087                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 21088                                  ;	  or NET device
 21089                                  ;
 21090                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 21091                                  ;
 21092                                  ;	  Modification history:
 21093                                  ;
 21094                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21095                                  
 21096                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 21097                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21098                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 21099                                  ;
 21100                                  ; Inputs:
 21101                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 21102                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 21103                                  ; Function:
 21104                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 21105                                  ; Returns:
 21106                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 21107                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 21108                                  ;	CX = Sector size
 21109                                  ;	AL = Sectors per allocation unit
 21110                                  ;	AH = FAT ID BYTE
 21111                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 21112                                  ; Segs except ES preserved, others destroyed
 21113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21114                                  
 21115                                  ;hkn; called from getset.asm and misc.asm. DS has already been set up to
 21116                                  ;hkn; DOSDATA. 
 21117                                  
 21118                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21119                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:732Bh
 21120                                  
 21121                                  DISK_INFO:
 21122                                  	; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21123                                  	; IBM DOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 37C5h
 21124                                  
 21125 00003281 E882E5                  	call	TestNet
 21126 00003284 7318                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DSK_INFO
 21127                                  
 21128                                  	;;;
 21129                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21130 00003286 31F6                    	xor     si,si	; free cluster count hw = 0
 21131 00003288 31FF                    	xor     di,di	; number of clusters hw = 0
 21132                                  	;;;
 21133                                  
 21134                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 21135                                  ;	transfer NET_DISK_INFO
 21136                                  ;ELSE
 21137                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 12
 21138                                  	;INT	2FH
 21139                                  	;return
 21140                                  
 21141 0000328A B80C11                  	mov     ax,110Ch
 21142 0000328D CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET DISK SPACE
 21143                                  			; ES:DI -> current directory
 21144                                  			; Return: AL = sectors per cluster, BX = total clusters
 21145                                  			; CX = bytes per sector, DX = number of available clusters
 21146                                  	;;;
 21147                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21148 0000328F 83FBFF                  	cmp	bx,0FFFFh
 21149 00003292 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_1
 21150 00003294 89DF                    	mov	di,bx
 21151                                  dsk_info_1:
 21152 00003296 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh
 21153 00003299 7502                    	jne	short disk_info_retn
 21154 0000329B 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 21155                                  disk_info_retn:
 21156                                  	;;;
 21157 0000329D C3                      	retn
 21158                                  ;ENDIF
 21159                                  
 21160                                  LOCAL_DSK_INFO:
 21161                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 21162                                  	;;;
 21163                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21164 0000329E E822E0                  	call	set_exerr_locus_disk
 21165                                  	;;;
 21166 000032A1 E8DFE5                  	call	ECritDisk
 21167 000032A4 E8592F                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; perform media check.
 21168                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21169                                  	;;; 02/02/2024
 21170 000032A7 720D                    	jc	short dsk_info_2
 21171 000032A9 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 21172 000032AB A3[E80A]                	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],ax ; 0	; clear high word of cluster number
 21173                                  	;;;
 21174 000032AE BB0200                  	MOV	BX,2
 21175 000032B1 E8D22C                  	call	UNPACK			; Get first FAT sector into CURBUF
 21176                                  	;JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21177                                  	;;;
 21178                                  	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21179 000032B4 7303                    	jnc	short dsk_info_3
 21180                                  dsk_info_2:
 21181                                  	;jmp	CRIT_LEAVE
 21182 000032B6 E9F7E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21183                                  dsk_info_3:
 21184                                  	;;;
 21185 000032B9 C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 21186                                  	; 02/02/2024
 21187                                  	;;mov	ah,[si+20]
 21188                                  	;mov	ah,[si+24] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21189 000032BD 8A6418                  	MOV	AH,[SI+BUFINSIZ]	; get FAT ID BYTE
 21190                                  
 21191                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 21192 000032C0 16                      	push	ss
 21193 000032C1 1F                      	pop	ds
 21194                                  
 21195                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21196                                  %if 0
 21197                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21198                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21199                                  
 21200                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 21201                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 21202                                  
 21203                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21204                                  	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 21205                                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 21206                                  	JZ	short DoScan
 21207                                  
 21208                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 21209                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 21210                                  ; the count.
 21211                                  
 21212                                  	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 21213                                  	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 21214                                  DoScan:
 21215                                  	XOR	DX,DX
 21216                                  	DEC	CX
 21217                                  SCANFREE:
 21218                                  	call	UNPACK
 21219                                  	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21220                                  	JNZ	short NOTFREECLUS
 21221                                  	INC	DX			; A free one
 21222                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21223                                  	INC	BX			; Next cluster
 21224                                  	LOOP	SCANFREE
 21225                                  	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 21226                                  ReturnVals:
 21227                                  	DEC	BX			; count
 21228                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21229                                  	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 21230                                  	INC	AL			; Sectors/cluster
 21231                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21232                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Bytes/sector
 21233                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx
 21234                                  	MOV	[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],DX
 21235                                  	CLC
 21236                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21237                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21238                                  	;retn
 21239                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21240                                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21241                                  
 21242                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 21243                                  ; return.
 21244                                  
 21245                                  GotVal: 
 21246                                  	MOV	BX,CX			; get cluster count
 21247                                  	JMP	short ReturnVals
 21248                                  
 21249                                  %else
 21250                                  	; 02/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21251 000032C2 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21252 000032C4 89F7                    	mov	di,si	; 0
 21253                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21254 000032C6 268B561F                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]	; get free count
 21255                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],si
 21256 000032CA 2639760F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],si ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21257 000032CE 7406                    	jz	short dsk_info_4	; yes
 21258                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21259 000032D0 268B4E0D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21260 000032D4 EB18                    	jmp	short dsk_info_5 ; zf=0, si=di=0
 21261                                  
 21262                                  dsk_info_4:
 21263                                  	;mov	di,[es:bp+2Fh]
 21264 000032D6 268B7E2F                	mov	di,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 21265                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 21266 000032DA 268B4E2D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 21267                                  	;mov	si,[es:bp+21h]
 21268 000032DE 268B7621                	mov	si,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW] ; hw of free cluster count
 21269 000032E2 39F2                    	cmp	dx,si			; same (zero) ?
 21270                                  ;dsk_info_5:
 21271 000032E4 7504                    	jnz	short dsk_info_6	; not same (not zero)
 21272 000032E6 42                      	inc	dx
 21273 000032E7 740B                    	jz	short dsk_info_8	; 0FFFFh -> 0 (free count is invalid/initial)
 21274                                  					; free count calculation is needed
 21275 000032E9 4A                      	dec	dx
 21276                                  dsk_info_6:
 21277 000032EA 39FE                    	cmp	si,di			; same hw ?
 21278 000032EC 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_7	; no
 21279                                  dsk_info_5:	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 
 21280 000032EE 39CA                    	cmp	dx,cx			; same lw ?
 21281                                  dsk_info_7:
 21282 000032F0 7268                    	jb	short GotVal		; free cluster count < last cluster number
 21283 000032F2 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; 0
 21284                                  dsk_info_8:
 21285 000032F4 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21286 000032F6 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; last cluster number - 1 = number of clusters
 21287 000032F9 19F7                    	sbb	di,si
 21288                                  	;or	byte [es:bp+18h],1
 21289 000032FB 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1 ; set first access bit 0
 21290                                  					; (Update flag for FSINFO sector)
 21291                                  SCANFREE:
 21292 00003300 56                      	push	si
 21293 00003301 FF36[EC0A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21294 00003305 57                      	push	di
 21295 00003306 E87D2C                  	call	UNPACK
 21296 00003309 5F                      	pop	di
 21297 0000330A 8F06[EC0A]              	pop	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21298 0000330E 5E                      	pop	si
 21299 0000330F 7246                    	jc	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21300 00003311 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21301 00003313 42                      	inc	dx			; a free one
 21302 00003314 7501                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21303 00003316 46                      	inc	si			; increase hw of free cluster count
 21304                                  
 21305                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21306 00003317 43                      	inc	bx			; next cluster
 21307 00003318 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS2
 21308 0000331A FF06[E80A]              	inc	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]	; increase hw of (next) cluster number
 21309                                  
 21310                                  NOTFREECLUS2:
 21311 0000331E 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; decrease remain cluster count for calculation
 21312 00003321 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0
 21313 00003324 75DA                    	jnz	short SCANFREE
 21314 00003326 E302                    	jcxz	NOTFREECLUS3		; calculation completed
 21315 00003328 EBD6                    	jmp	short SCANFREE
 21316                                  
 21317                                  NOTFREECLUS3:
 21318 0000332A 8B3E[E80A]              	mov	di,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 21319 0000332E 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21320 00003331 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0			; di:bx = last cluster number
 21321                                  
 21322                                  ReturnVals:
 21323 00003334 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21324 00003336 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21325 00003339 19CF                    	sbb	di,cx			; di:bx = number of clusters
 21326                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 21327 0000333B 268A4604                	mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK] ; spc - 1
 21328 0000333F FEC0                    	inc	al			; sectors per cluster
 21329                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx		
 21330 00003341 2689561F                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],dx	; free cluster count,lw
 21331                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx ; 0
 21332 00003345 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0 ; FAT32 (16 bit FAT size = 0) ?
 21333 00003349 7507                    	jnz	short ReturnVals2	; no
 21334                                  	;mov	[es:bp+21h],si
 21335 0000334B 26897621                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW],si ; hw of free cluster count
 21336                                  
 21337 0000334F E83800                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 21338                                  
 21339                                  ReturnVals2:
 21340                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 21341 00003352 268B4E02                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; bytes per sector
 21342 00003356 F8                      	clc
 21343                                  
 21344                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21345                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21346                                  	;retn
 21347 00003357 E956E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21348                                  
 21349                                  GotVal:
 21350 0000335A 89CB                    	mov	bx,cx
 21351 0000335C EBD6                    	jmp	short ReturnVals
 21352                                  
 21353                                  %endif
 21354                                  
 21355                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21356                                  
 21357                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21358                                  
 21359                                  modify_spc:
 21360 0000335E 50                      	push	ax			; ax = sectors per cluster
 21361 0000335F 52                      	push	dx
 21362 00003360 F7E1                    	mul	cx			; bytes per sector
 21363                                  	;cmp	dx,0
 21364 00003362 21D2                    	and	dx,dx
 21365 00003364 7503                    	jnz	short mspc_1
 21366 00003366 3D0040                  	cmp	ax,16384		; 16 kilobytes (per cluster)
 21367                                  					; ***
 21368                                  					; actual disk size limit
 21369                                  					; without invalidating cluster counts is
 21370                                  					; 2 GB (512K clusters * 8 sectors per cluster)
 21371                                  					;      (128K clusters * 32 sectors per cluster)
 21372                                  mspc_1:
 21373 00003369 5A                      	pop	dx
 21374 0000336A 58                      	pop	ax
 21375 0000336B 760E                    	jbe	short mspc_3		; bytes per cluster <= 16 KB
 21376                                                                          ; ***
 21377                                                                          ; bytes per cluster > 16 KB
 21378 0000336D 31FF                    	xor	di,di			; 0
 21379 0000336F BBFEFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFEh		; (invalidated)
 21380 00003372 09F6                    	or	si,si			; hw of free cluster count
 21381 00003374 7404                    	jz	short mspc_2		; si = 0
 21382 00003376 89FE                    	mov	si,di			; si = 0
 21383 00003378 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx			; dx = bx = 0FFFEh (invalidated)
 21384                                  mspc_2:
 21385 0000337A C3                      	retn
 21386                                  
 21387                                  mspc_3:
 21388 0000337B D1E0                    	shl	ax,1			; sectors per clust = sectors per clust * 2
 21389                                  					; (ax <= 32768) -modified spc limit-
 21390 0000337D D1EF                    	shr	di,1			; cluster count = cluster count /2
 21391                                  					; di:bx = modified value of total clusters
 21392                                  mspc_4:
 21393 0000337F D1DB                    	rcr	bx,1
 21394 00003381 D1EE                    	shr	si,1			; free clusters = free clusters / 2
 21395 00003383 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1			; si:dx = modified value of free clusters
 21396                                  
 21397                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21398                                  
 21399                                  	; 03/02/2024
 21400                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7431h
 21401                                  
 21402                                  modify_cluster_count:
 21403 00003385 09FF                    	or	di,di			; hw of cluster count
 21404 00003387 75D5                    	jnz	short modify_spc
 21405 00003389 C3                      	retn

 21411                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21412                                  ; --------------------------------
 21413                                  ; FAT32 FSInfo Sector Structure
 21414                                  ; --------------------------------
 21415                                  ; ref: Microsoft FAT32 File System Specification (2000)
 21416                                  
 21417                                  struc FSINFO		; Offset ;
 21418 00000000 ????????                .LeadSig:	resb 4	  ; 0		; Value 0x41615252. Lead Signature.
 21419 00000004 <res 1E0h>              .Reserved1:	resb 480  ; 4		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21420 000001E4 ????????                .StrucSig:	resb 4	  ; 484		; Value 0x61417272. Fields Signature.
 21421 000001E8 ????????                .Free_Count:	resb 4	  ; 488		; Last known free cluster count. (*) 
 21422 000001EC ????????                .Nxt_Free:	resb 4	  ; 492		; Start clus for free clus srch. (**)
 21423 000001F0 <res Ch>                .Reserved2:	resb 12	  ; 496		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21424 000001FC ????????                .TrailSig:	resb 4	  ; 508		; Value 0xAA550000. Trail Signature.
 21425                                  .size:
 21426                                  endstruc
 21427                                  
 21428                                  ; (*) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then the free count is unknown
 21429                                  ;     and must be computed.
 21430                                  ; (**) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then free cluster search must be started
 21431                                  ;     from cluster 2.
 21432                                  ; Lead Signature, Fields (Structure) Signature and Trail Signature
 21433                                  ; are used to validate FSInfo sector.
 21434                                  
 21435                                  ; --------------------------------
 21436                                  
 21437                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21438                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7436h
 21439                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7227h)
 21440                                  
 21441                                  update_fat32_fsinfo:
 21442 0000338A 51                      	push	cx
 21443 0000338B 52                      	push	dx
 21444 0000338C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21445                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+25h]
 21446 0000338E 268B5625                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FSINFO_SECTOR]
 21447                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx
 21448 00003392 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0
 21449                                  				; (16bit FAT size field = 0 for FAT32 fs)
 21450 00003396 7505                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_1
 21451 00003398 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh ; -1
 21452 0000339B 7508                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_2
 21453                                  
 21454                                  u_fat32_inf_1:
 21455 0000339D 5A                      	pop	dx
 21456 0000339E 59                      	pop	cx
 21457                                  	;and	byte [es:bp+18h],0F4h
 21458 0000339F 26806618F4              	and	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],0F4h ; clear bit 0,1 and 3
 21459                                  					; bit 0 - FSINFO update (dirty) bit
 21460                                  					; bit 1 - BPB_RootClus update bit
 21461                                  					; bit 3 - BPB_ExtFlags update bit
 21462 000033A4 C3                      	retn
 21463                                  
 21464                                  u_fat32_inf_2:
 21465 000033A5 50                      	push	ax
 21466 000033A6 53                      	push	bx
 21467 000033A7 57                      	push	di
 21468 000033A8 56                      	push	si
 21469 000033A9 1E                      	push	ds
 21470 000033AA 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0	; is buffers in HMA?
 21471 000033B0 740A                    	jz	short u_fat32_inf_3	; no
 21472 000033B2 36C53E[7A00]            	lds	di,[ss:LoMemBuff]	; read it into scratch buffer
 21473                                  	;sub	di,24
 21474 000033B7 83EF18                  	sub	di,BUFINSIZ		; space for buffer header
 21475                                  					; (buffer header size = 24)
 21476                                  	;clc
 21477 000033BA EB0E                    	jmp	short u_fat32_inf_4
 21478                                  
 21479                                  u_fat32_inf_3:
 21480 000033BC 06                      	push	es
 21481 000033BD 55                      	push	bp
 21482 000033BE E89D31                  	call	GETCURHEAD		; ds:di = first buffer in queue
 21483 000033C1 52                      	push	dx
 21484 000033C2 E8FC33                  	call	BUFWRITE		; BufWrite writes a buffer to the disk,
 21485                                  					;  if it's dirty.
 21486 000033C5 5A                      	pop	dx
 21487 000033C6 5D                      	pop	bp
 21488 000033C7 07                      	pop	es
 21489                                  ;u_fat32_inf_4:
 21490 000033C8 726A                    	jc	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21491                                  u_fat32_inf_4:
 21492 000033CA 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21493                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24]
 21494 000033CC 8D5D18                  	lea	bx,[di+BUFINSIZ]	; buffer data address
 21495                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 21496 000033CF 36C606[4B03]18          	mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 21497 000033D5 36890E[0706]            	mov	[ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 21498 000033DA 41                      	inc	cx			; cx = sector count = 1
 21499                                  					; es:bp = DPB
 21500 000033DB 53                      	push	bx			; ds:bx = buffer (data) address
 21501 000033DC 52                      	push	dx			; HIGH_SECTOR:dx = disk sector address
 21502 000033DD E8DE0A                  	call	DREAD		 	; read fs info sector
 21503 000033E0 5A                      	pop	dx
 21504 000033E1 5B                      	pop	bx
 21505 000033E2 7250                    	jc	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21506                                  
 21507                                  	;cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.LeadSig],5252h	
 21508 000033E4 813F5252                	cmp	word [bx],5252h		; 'RR'
 21509 000033E8 754A                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21510                                  	;cmp	word [bx+2],4161h	; 'aA' ; (NASM syntax)
 21511 000033EA 817F026141              	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.LeadSig+2],4161h
 21512 000033EF 7543                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21513                                  	
 21514                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1E4h],7272h	; 'rr' at offset 484
 21515 000033F1 81BFE4017272            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.StrucSig],7272h
 21516 000033F7 753B                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21517                                  
 21518                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1E6h],6141h	; 'Aa' at offset 486
 21519 000033F9 81BFE6014161            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.StrucSig+2],6141h
 21520 000033FF 7533                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21521                                  
 21522                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1FEh],0AA55h	; boot signature at offset 510
 21523 00003401 81BFFE0155AA            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.TrailSig+2],0AA55h
 21524 00003407 752B                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21525                                  	
 21526                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21527 00003409 268B461F                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]
 21528                                  	;mov	[bx+1E8h],ax 
 21529 0000340D 8987E801                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Free_Count],ax ; at offset 488
 21530                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+21h]
 21531 00003411 268B4621                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 21532                                  	;mov	[bx+1EAh],ax
 21533 00003415 8987EA01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Free_Count+2],ax
 21534                                  
 21535                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+39h]
 21536 00003419 268B4639                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE]
 21537                                  	;mov	[bx+1ECh],ax
 21538 0000341D 8987EC01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Nxt_Free],ax	; at offset 492
 21539                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+3Bh]
 21540 00003421 268B463B                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2]
 21541                                  	;mov	[bx+1EEh],ax
 21542 00003425 8987EE01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Nxt_Free+2],ax
 21543                                  
 21544 00003429 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21545 0000342B 36890E[0706]            	mov	[ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 21546 00003430 41                      	inc	cx	; 1
 21547 00003431 E8EF0A                  	call	DWRITE
 21548                                  
 21549                                  u_fat32_inf_5:
 21550 00003434 1F                      	pop	ds
 21551 00003435 5E                      	pop	si
 21552 00003436 5F                      	pop	di
 21553 00003437 5B                      	pop	bx
 21554 00003438 58                      	pop	ax
 21555 00003439 E961FF                  	jmp	u_fat32_inf_1
 21556                                  
 21557                                  ;============================================================================
 21558                                  ; ISEARCH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21559                                  ;============================================================================
 21560                                  ; 22/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21561                                  
 21562                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_SEARCH - Internal SEARCH calls for MS-DOS
 21563                                  ;	NAME	DOS_SEARCH
 21564                                  
 21565                                  ;**	Low level routines for doing local and NET directory searches
 21566                                  ;
 21567                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21568                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 21569                                  ;	RENAME_NEXT
 21570                                  ;
 21571                                  ;	Revision history:
 21572                                  ;
 21573                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21574                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 21575                                  ;	    A001	PTM 3564 -- search for fastopen
 21576                                  
 21577                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 21578                                  
 21579                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21580                                  ;
 21581                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21582                                  ;
 21583                                  ; Inputs:
 21584                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 21585                                  ;		terminated)
 21586                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 21587                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 21588                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 21589                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 21590                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 21591                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 21592                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer
 21593                                  ; Function:
 21594                                  ;	Initiate a search for the given file spec
 21595                                  ; Outputs:
 21596                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 21597                                  ;	    The 53 bytes ot DMAADD are filled in as follows:
 21598                                  ;
 21599                                  ;	LOCAL
 21600                                  ;	    Drive Byte (A=1, B=2, ...) High bit clear
 21601                                  ;		NEVER STORE DRIVE BYTE AFTER  found_it
 21602                                  ;	    11 byte search name with Meta chars in it
 21603                                  ;	    Search Attribute Byte, attribute of search
 21604                                  ;	    WORD LastEnt value
 21605                                  ;	    WORD DirStart
 21606                                  ;	    4 byte pad
 21607                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 21608                                  ;	NET
 21609                                  ;	    21 bytes First byte has high bit set
 21610                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 21611                                  ;
 21612                                  ;	CARRY SET
 21613                                  ;	    AX = error code
 21614                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 21615                                  ;			No match for this file
 21616                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 21617                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 21618                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 21619                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 21620                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 21621                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21622                                  
 21623                                  ; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 21624                                  ; 24/01/2024
 21625                                  %if 0
 21626                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21627                                  GET_FAST_SEARCH:
 21628                                  	; 22/07/2018
 21629                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21630                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21631                                  	OR	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],(SEARCH_FASTOPEN>>8)  ; 04h
 21632                                  	;OR	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],SEARCH_FASTOPEN  ; 400h
 21633                                  					;FO.trigger fastopen ;AN000;
 21634                                  	;call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21635                                  	;retn
 21636                                  	; 24/01/2024
 21637                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21638                                  	;jmp	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21639                                  %endif
 21640                                  
 21641                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 21642                                  	; DOSCODE:6C22h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 21643                                  
 21644                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21645                                  	; DOSCODE:74E9h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 21646                                  
 21647                                  DOS_SEARCH_FIRST:
 21648                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3 kernel) - Offset 3826h

 21650 0000343C C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]

 21652 00003443 7506                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET2
 21653

 21656                                  ;ELSE
 21657                                  	;mov	ax,1119h

 21659 00003448 CD2F                    	INT	2Fh
 21660 0000344A C3                      	retn
 21661                                  ;ENDIF
 21662

 21664                                  	;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h

 21668 0000344B 26F6454480              	test	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 21669                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 21670 00003450 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_SEARCH_FIRST
 21671                                  
 21672                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 21673                                  ;	transfer NET_SEARCH_FIRST
 21674                                  ;ELSE
 21675                                  	;mov	ax,111Bh
 21676 00003452 B81B11                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|27
 21677 00003455 CD2F                    	INT	2FH
 21678 00003457 C3                      	retn
 21679                                  ;ENDIF
 21680                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21681                                  LOCAL_SEARCH_FIRST:
 21682 00003458 E828E4                  	call	ECritDisk
 21683

 21685                                  	;; MSDOS 6.0
 21686                                  	;;;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],400h
 21687                                  	;; 17/12/2022
 21688                                  	;;test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],04h
 21689                                  	;test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],(SEARCH_FASTOPEN>>8)
 21690                                  	;;TEST	word [DOS34_FLAG],SEARCH_FASTOPEN ;AN000;
 21691                                  	;JZ	short NOFN			;AN000;
 21692                                  	;;or	byte [FastOpenFlg],1

 21694

 21696 0000345B C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1	; if we find a dir, don't change to it
 21697

 21699                                  %if 0

 21701                                  	CALL	CHECK_QUESTION		;AN000;;FO. is '?' in path
 21702                                  	JNC	short norm_GETPATH	;AN000;;FO. no
 21703                                  %else
 21704                                  	; 03/02/2024
 21705 00003460 16                      	push	ss
 21706 00003461 1F                      	pop	ds			;AN000;;FO. ds:si -> final path
 21707 00003462 8B36[B205]              	mov	si,[WFP_START]		;AN000;;FO.
 21708                                  getnext:				;AN000;

 21724                                  ;_getdone:

 21753                                  found_entry:

 22066                                  ;============================================================================
 22067                                  ; ABORT.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22068                                  ;============================================================================
 22069                                  ; 23/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22070                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22071                                  
 22072                                  ;**
 22073                                  ;
 22074                                  ; Internal Abort call closes all handles and FCBs associated with a process.
 22075                                  ;  If process has NET resources a close all is sent out over the net.
 22076                                  ;
 22077                                  ;   DOS_ABORT
 22078                                  ;
 22079                                  ;   Modification history:
 22080                                  ;
 22081                                  ;       Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 22082                                  ;
 22083                                  ;	M038	SR	10/16/90	Free SFT with the PSP of the process
 22084                                  ;				being terminated only if it is busy.
 22085                                  ;
 22086                                  
 22087                                  ;Break   <DOS_ABORT -- CLOSE all files for process>
 22088                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22089                                  ;
 22090                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ABORT
 22091                                  ;
 22092                                  ; Inputs:
 22093                                  ;       [CurrentPDB] set to PID of process aborting
 22094                                  ; Function:
 22095                                  ;       Close all files and free all SFTs for this PID
 22096                                  ; Returns:
 22097                                  ;       None
 22098                                  ; All destroyed except stack
 22099                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22100                                  
 22101                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22102                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7685h
 22103                                  	; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:74F4h) 
 22104                                  
 22105                                  DOS_ABORT:
 22106 00003595 368E06[3003]            	MOV     ES,[SS:CurrentPDB]	; SS override
 22107 0000359A 268B0E3200              	MOV     CX,[ES:PDB.JFN_Length]  ; Number of JFNs
 22108                                  reset_free_jfn:
 22109 0000359F 89CB                    	MOV     BX,CX
 22110 000035A1 51                      	PUSH    CX
 22111 000035A2 4B                      	DEC     BX                      ; get jfn (start with last one)
 22112                                  
 22113 000035A3 E84B3E                  	CALL	_$CLOSE
 22114 000035A6 59                      	POP     CX
 22115 000035A7 E2F6                    	LOOP    reset_free_jfn          ; and do 'em all
 22116                                  
 22117                                  ; Note: We do need to explicitly close FCBs. Reasons are as follows: If we
 22118                                  ; are running in the no-sharing no-network environment, we are simulating the
 22119                                  ; 2.0 world and thus if the user doesn't close the file, that is his problem
 22120                                  ; BUT... the cache remains in a state with garbage that may be reused by the
 22121                                  ; next process. We scan the set and blast the ref counts of the FCBs we own.
 22122                                  ;
 22123                                  ; If sharing is loaded, then the following call to close process will
 22124                                  ; correctly close all FCBs. We will then need to walk the list AFTER here.
 22125                                  ;
 22126                                  ; Finally, the following call to NET_Abort will cause an EOP to be sent to all
 22127                                  ; known network resources. These resources are then responsible for cleaning
 22128                                  ; up after this process.
 22129                                  ;
 22130                                  ; Sleazy, eh?
 22131                                  
 22132                                  	;context DS			; SS is DOSDATA
 22133 000035A9 16                      	push	ss
 22134 000035AA 1F                      	pop	ds  ; 09/09/2018
 22135                                  
 22136                                  	;CallInstall Net_Abort, MultNET, 29
 22137 000035AB B81D11                  	mov	ax,111Dh
 22138 000035AE CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR 
 22139                                  			;	    - CLOSE ALL REMOTE FILES FOR PROCESS
 22140                                  			; DS???, SS = DOS CS
 22141                                  ;if installed
 22142 000035B0 FF1E[A000]              	call	far [JShare+(4*4)]	; 4 = MFTCloseP
 22143                                  ;else
 22144                                  ;	call 	MFTCloseP
 22145                                  ;endif
 22146                                  
 22147                                  ; Scan the FCB cache for guys that belong to this process and zap their ref
 22148                                  ; counts.
 22149                                  					; SS override
 22150 000035B4 36C43E[4000]            	les     di,[ss:SFTFCB]		; grab the pointer to the table
 22151                                  
 22152                                  	;;;
 22153                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22154                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22155                                  SFTFCB_check:
 22156 000035B9 8CC1                    	mov	cx,es
 22157 000035BB 09F9                    	or	cx,di
 22158 000035BD E325                    	jcxz	FCBScanDone
 22159 000035BF 57                      	push	di
 22160                                  SFTFCB_OK:
 22161                                  	;;;
 22162                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 22163 000035C0 268B4D04                	mov     cx,[es:di+SFT.SFCount]
 22164                                  	;jcxz	FCBScanDone
 22165                                  	; 27/06/2024
 22166                                  	;;;
 22167 000035C4 E315                    	jcxz    SFTFCB_check2	
 22168                                  	;;;
 22169                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 22170 000035C6 8D7D06                  	LEA     DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]	; point at table
 22171 000035C9 36A1[3C03]              	mov     ax,[SS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 22172                                  FCBTest:
 22173                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 22174 000035CD 26394531                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],ax ; is this one of ours
 22175 000035D1 7503                    	jnz	short FCBNext		; no, skip it
 22176                                  
 22177                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22178                                  %if 0
 22179                                  	mov	word [es:di],0
 22180                                  	;mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ; yes, blast ref count
 22181                                  %else
 22182                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22183                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22184 000035D3 E8C513                  	call    SFT_FREE
 22185                                  %endif
 22186                                  
 22187                                  FCBNext:
 22188 000035D6 83C73B                  	add     di,SF_ENTRY.size ; 59 (for MSDOS 6.0)
 22189 000035D9 E2F2                    	loop    FCBTest
 22190                                  
 22191                                  	; 27/06/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 22192                                  	;;;
 22193                                  SFTFCB_check2:
 22194 000035DB 5F                      	pop	di
 22195 000035DC 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 22196 000035DF 83FFFF                  	cmp	di,0FFFFh
 22197 000035E2 75D5                    	jne	short SFTFCB_check
 22198                                  	;;;
 22199                                  
 22200                                  FCBScanDone:
 22201                                  
 22202                                  ; Walk the SFT to eliminate all busy SFT's for this process.
 22203                                  
 22204 000035E4 31DB                    	XOR     BX,BX
 22205                                  Scan:
 22206 000035E6 53                      	push    bx
 22207 000035E7 E8833D                  	call	SFFromSFN
 22208 000035EA 5B                      	pop     bx
 22209                                  	;jnc	short Scan1
 22210                                  	;retn
 22211                                  
 22212                                  	; 18/12/2022
 22213                                  	;jc	short NO_Question ; retn
 22214                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22215 000035EB 7232                    	jc	short RET2
 22216                                  
 22217                                  ;M038
 22218                                  ; Do what the comment above says, check for busy state
 22219                                  
 22220                                  Scan1:
 22221                                  	;cmp	word [es:di],0
 22222                                  	;jz	short scan_next  ; MSDOS 3.3
 22223                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22224 000035ED 26833DFF                	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy ; -1
 22225                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy
 22226                                  				; Is Sft busy? ;M038
 22227 000035F1 7517                    	jnz	short scan_next ; no
 22228                                  ;
 22229                                  ; we have a SFT that is busy. See if it is for the current process
 22230                                  ;
 22231 000035F3 36A1[3C03]              	mov     ax,[SS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 22232                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 22233 000035F7 26394531                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],ax
 22234 000035FB 750D                    	jnz	short scan_next
 22235 000035FD 36A1[3E03]              	mov     ax,[SS:USER_ID]		; SS override
 22236                                  	;sub	ax,[es:di+2Fh] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM ; 03/02/2024
 22237                                  	;cmp	[es:di+2Fh],ax
 22238 00003601 2639452F                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_UID],ax
 22239 00003605 7503                    	jnz	short scan_next
 22240                                  
 22241                                  ; This SFT is labelled as ours.
 22242                                  
 22243                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22244                                  %if 0
 22245                                  	mov	word [es:di],0
 22246                                  	;mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0
 22247                                  %else
 22248                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22249                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22250 00003607 E89113                  	call    SFT_FREE
 22251                                  %endif
 22252                                  
 22253                                  scan_next:
 22254 0000360A 43                      	inc     bx
 22255 0000360B EBD9                    	jmp     short Scan
 22256

 22258                                  ; CLOSE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22259                                  ;============================================================================
 22260                                  ; 23/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22261                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22262                                  
 22263                                  ;**	Internal Close and Commit calls to close a local or NET SFT.
 22264                                  ;
 22265                                  ;	DOS_CLOSE
 22266                                  ;	DOS_COMMIT
 22267                                  ;	FREE_SFT
 22268                                  ;	SetSFTTimes
 22269                                  ;
 22270                                  ;	Revision history:
 22271                                  ;
 22272                                  ;	   AN000  version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 22273                                  ;	   A005   PTM 3718 --- lost clusters when fastopen installed
 22274                                  ;	   A011   PTM 4766 --- C2 fastopen problem
 22275                                  
 22276                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 22277                                  
 22278                                  ;Break <DOS_CLOSE -- CLOSE FILE from SFT>
 22279                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22280                                  ;
 22281                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_CLOSE
 22282                                  ;
 22283                                  ; Inputs:
 22284                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being used
 22285                                  ; Function:
 22286                                  ;	Close the indicated file via the SFT
 22287                                  ; Returns:
 22288                                  ;	sf_ref_count decremented otherwise
 22289                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 22290                                  ;	Carry set if error
 22291                                  ;	    AX has error code
 22292                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 22293                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22294                                  
 22295                                  ;hkn; DOS_CLOSE called from fcbio.asm and handle.asm. DS alreday set up.
 22296                                  
 22297                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22298                                  ; DOSCODE:6E2Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22299                                  
 22300                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22301                                  ; DOSCODE:6E1Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 22302                                  
 22303                                  ; 23/07/2018 - IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987 - Offset 39D0h
 22304                                  
 22305                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22306                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:76FEh
 22307                                  	; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7579h) 
 22308                                  
 22309                                  DOS_CLOSE:
 22310 0000360D C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 22311                                  	;mov	bx,[ES:DI+5]
 22312 00003611 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 22313                                  
 22314                                  ; Network closes are handled entirely by the net code.
 22315                                  
 22316                                  	;;test	bx,8000h
 22317                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet
 22318                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22319                                  	;test	bh,80h
 22320 00003615 F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8)
 22321 00003618 7406                    	JZ	short LocalClose
 22322                                  
 22323                                  	;CallInstall Net_Close,MultNET,6
 22324 0000361A B80611                  	mov     ax,1106h
 22325 0000361D CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CLOSE REMOTE FILE
 22326                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 22327                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 22328                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 22329                                  			; CF clear if successful
 22330                                  RET2:		; 03/02/2024
 22331 0000361F C3                      	retn
 22332                                  
 22333                                  ; All closes release the sharing information.
 22334                                  ; No commit releases sharing information
 22335                                  ;
 22336                                  ; All closes decrement the ref count.
 22337                                  ; No commit decrements the ref count.
 22338                                  
 22339                                  LocalClose:
 22340 00003620 E860E2                  	call	ECritDisk
 22341 00003623 E8BE01                  	CALL	SetSFTTimes
 22342 00003626 E84101                  	CALL	FREE_SFT		; dec ref count or mark as busy
 22343                                  
 22344                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 22345                                  	;Context DS
 22346 00003629 16                      	push	ss
 22347 0000362A 1F                      	pop	ds
 22348                                  
 22349 0000362B 50                      	push	ax
 22350 0000362C 53                      	push	bx
 22351 0000362D E8D84A                  	call	ShareEnd
 22352 00003630 5B                      	pop	bx
 22353 00003631 58                      	pop	ax
 22354                                  
 22355                                  ; Commit enters here. AX from commit MUST be <> 1, BX is flags word
 22356                                  
 22357                                  CloseEntry:
 22358 00003632 50                      	PUSH	AX
 22359                                  
 22360                                  ; File clean or device does not get stamped nor disk looked at.
 22361                                  
 22362                                  	;test	bx,0C0h
 22363                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22364 00003633 F6C3C0                  	test	bl,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22365                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22366 00003636 7403                    	JZ	short rdir
 22367                                  	; 14/11/2022
 22368 00003638 E9F600                  	JMP	FREE_SFT_OK		; either clean or device
 22369                                  	;jnz	short FREE_SFT_OK ; 24/07/2019	
 22370                                  
 22371                                  ; Retrieve the directory entry for the file
 22372                                  
 22373                                  rdir:
 22374 0000363B E83901                  	CALL	DirFromSFT
 22375                                  	;mov	al,5
 22376 0000363E B005                    	MOV	AL,error_access_denied
 22377                                  	
 22378                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22379                                  	;JNC	short clook
 22380                                  	;; 14/11/2022
 22381                                  	;JMP	CloseFinish		; pretend the close worked.
 22382                                  	;;jc	short CloseFinish ; 24/07/2019
 22383                                  	
 22384                                  	;;;

 22743                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22744                                  ;
 22745                                  ; Procedure Name : FREE_SFT
 22746                                  ;
 22747                                  ; ES:DI -> SFT. Decs sft_ref_count. If the count goes to 0, mark it as busy.
 22748                                  ; Flags preserved. Return old ref count in AX
 22749                                  ;
 22750                                  ; Note that busy is indicated by the SFT ref count being -1.
 22751                                  ;
 22752                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 22754                                  FREE_SFT:

 22845 000037AC F6641F                  	MUL	byte [SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_dirpos]
 22846 000037AF 01C7                    	ADD	DI,AX			; Point at the entry
 22847 000037B1 C3                      	retn				; carry is clear

 22854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22855                                  ;
 22856                                  ;**	DOS_Commit - UPdate Directory Entries
 22857                                  ;
 22858                                  ;	ENTRY	same as DOS_CLOSE (??? BUGBUG - update this jgl)
 22859                                  ;		(DS) = DOSGROUP
 22860                                  ;	EXIT	Same as DOS_CLOSE except ref_count field is not altered
 22861                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 22862                                  ;
 22863                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22864                                  
 22865                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22866                                  ; DOSCODE:6F72h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 22867                                  
 22868                                  ; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 22869                                  ; DOSCODE:78B8h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 22870                                  
 22871                                  DOS_COMMIT:
 22872                                  	;hkn; called from srvcall. DS already set up.
 22873 000037B5 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 22874                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+5]
 22875 000037B9 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 22876                                  	;test	bx,0C0h
 22877                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22878 000037BD F6C3C0                  	test	bl,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 22879                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 22880 000037C0 75F2                    	jnz	short PopDone_retn
 22881                                  	;test	bx,8000h
 22882                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22883                                  	;test	bh,80h
 22884 000037C2 F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 22885                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet ; 8000h
 22886 000037C5 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_COMMIT
 22887                                  
 22888                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 22889                                  ;	transfer NET_COMMIT
 22890                                  ;ELSE
 22891                                  	;mov	ax,1107h
 22892 000037C7 B80711                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|7
 22893 000037CA CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - COMMIT REMOTE FILE
 22894                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 22895                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 22896                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 22897                                  			; CF clear if successful
 22898                                  localcommit_retn: ; 18/12/2022	
 22899 000037CC C3                      	retn
 22900                                  ;ENDIF
 22901                                  
 22902                                  ; Perform local commit operation by doing a close but not releaseing the SFT.
 22903                                  ; There are three ways we can do this. One is to enter a critical section to
 22904                                  ; protect a potential free. The second is to increment the ref count to mask
 22905                                  ; the close decrementing.
 22906                                  ;
 22907                                  ; The proper way is to let the caller's of close decide if a decrement should
 22908                                  ; be done. We do this by providing another entry into close after the
 22909                                  ; decrement and after the share information release.
 22910                                  
 22911                                  ; DOSCODE:6FA0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22912                                  ; DOSCODE:6F8Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 22913                                  
 22914                                  LOCAL_COMMIT:
 22915 000037CD E8B3E0                  	call	ECritDisk
 22916                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22917 000037D0 E8B0E0                  	call	ECritDisk	;PTM.
 22918 000037D3 E80E00                  	call	SetSFTTimes
 22919 000037D6 B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 22920 000037D9 E856FE                  	call	CloseEntry
 22921                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22922 000037DC 9C                      	PUSHF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 22923 000037DD E81617                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT	;PTM.  increment device count	;AN000;
 22924 000037E0 9D                      	POPF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 22925                                  	;call	LCritDisk	;PTM.				;AN000;
 22926                                  	; 18/12/2022
 22927 000037E1 E9CCE0                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 22928                                  ;localcommit_retn:
 22929                                  ;	retn
 22930                                  
 22931                                  ;Break	<SetSFTTimes - signal a change in the times for an SFT>
 22932                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22933                                  ;
 22934                                  ; Procedure Name : SetSFTTimes
 22935                                  ;
 22936                                  ;   SetSFTTimes - Examine the flags for a SFT and set the time appropriately.
 22937                                  ;   Reflect these times in other SFT's for the same file.
 22938                                  ;
 22939                                  ;   Inputs:	ES:DI point to SFT
 22940                                  ;		BX = sf_flags set appropriately
 22941                                  ;   Outputs:	Set sft times to current time if File & dirty & !nodate
 22942                                  ;   Registers modified: All except ES:DI, BX, AX
 22943                                  ;
 22944                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22945                                  
 22946                                  	; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22947                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM 
 22948                                  
 22949                                  SetSFTTimes:
 22950                                  
 22951                                  ; 04/02/2024
 22952                                  %if 0
 22953                                  ;	File clean or device does not get stamped nor disk looked at.
 22954                                  	
 22955                                  	;test	bx,0C0h
 22956                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22957                                  	test	bl,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22958                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22959                                  	;retnz				; clean or device => no timestamp
 22960                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 22961                                  
 22962                                  ;	file and dirty. See if date is good
 22963                                  
 22964                                  	;test	bx,4000h
 22965                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22966                                  	;test	bh,40h
 22967                                  	test	bh,(sf_close_nodate>>8)
 22968                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_close_nodate
 22969                                  	;retnz				; nodate => no timestamp
 22970                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 22971                                  %else
 22972                                  	; 04/02/2024
 22973                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 22974                                  	;test	bx,40C0h
 22975 000037E4 F7C3C040                	test	bx,sf_close_nodate+devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22976 000037E8 75E2                    	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 22977                                  %endif
 22978                                  
 22979 000037EA 50                      	push	ax
 22980 000037EB 53                      	push	bx
 22981 000037EC E84ED3                  	call	DATE16			; Date/Time to AX/DX
 22982                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
 22983 000037EF 2689450F                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date],AX
 22984                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Dh],dx
 22985 000037F3 2689550D                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time],DX
 22986 000037F7 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 22987                                  ;if installed
 22988                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 22989 000037F9 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]	; 14 = ShSU
 22990                                  ;else
 22991                                  ;	call	ShSU
 22992                                  ;endif
 22993 000037FD 5B                      	pop	bx
 22994 000037FE 58                      	pop	ax
 22995 000037FF C3                      	retn

 23019                                  ;BREAK <DOS_MkDir - Make a directory entry>
 23020                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23021                                  ;
 23022                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_MkDir
 23023                                  ;
 23024                                  ; Inputs:
 23025                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23026                                  ;		terminated)
 23027                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23028                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 23029                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 23030                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 23031                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 23032                                  ; Function:
 23033                                  ;	Make a new directory
 23034                                  ; Returns:
 23035                                  ;	Carry Clear
 23036                                  ;		No error
 23037                                  ;	Carry Set
 23038                                  ;	    AX is error code
 23039                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 23040                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 23041                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 23042                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 23043                                  ;		error_access_denied
 23044                                  ;			Already exists, device name
 23045                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 23046                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23047                                  
 23048                                  ;hkn; called from path.asm. DS already set up.
 23049                                  
 23050                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23051                                  ; DOSCODE:6FC6h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23052                                  
 23053                                  ; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23054                                  ; DOSCODE:78FFh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)

 23066                                  			; SS = DOS CS
 23067                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified directory name
 23068                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 23069                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 23070                                  			; CF clear if successful
