 23302                                  ;BREAK <DOS_ChDir -- Verify a directory>
 23303                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23304                                  ;
 23305                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ChDir
 23306                                  ;
 23307                                  ; Inputs:
 23308                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23309                                  ;		terminated)
 23310                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23311                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 23312                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 23313                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used May not be NUL
 23314                                  ; Function:
 23315                                  ;	Validate the path for potential new current directory
 23316                                  ; Returns:
 23317                                  ;	NOTE:
 23318                                  ;	    [SATTRIB] is modified by this call
 23319                                  ;	Carry Clear

 23668                                  ;	TITLE	DISK - Disk utility routines
 23669                                  ;	NAME	Disk
 23670                                  
 23671                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 23672                                  ;
 23673                                  ;	SWAPCON
 23674                                  ;	SWAPBACK
 23675                                  ;	DOS_READ
 23676                                  ;	DOS_WRITE
 23677                                  ;	get_io_sft
 23678                                  ;	DirRead
 23679                                  ;	FIRSTCLUSTER
 23680                                  ;	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 23681                                  ;	FATSecRd
 23682                                  ;	DREAD
 23683                                  ;	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK
 23684                                  ;	CHECK_READ_LOCK
 23685                                  ;
 23686                                  ;	Revision history:
 23687                                  ;
 23688                                  ;		A000   version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 23689                                  ;
 23690                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23691                                  ;
 23692                                  ; M065 : B#5276. On raw read/write of a block of characters if a critical
 23693                                  ;		error happens, DOS retries the entire block assuming that
 23694                                  ;		zero characters were transferred. Modified the code to take
 23695                                  ;		into account the number of characters transfered before
 23696                                  ;		retrying the operation.
 23697                                  ;
 23698                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23699                                  ;
 23700                                  
 23701                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 23702                                  
 23703                                  ;Break	<SwapCon, Swap Back - Old-style I/O to files>
 23704                                  
 23705                                  ; **** Drivers for file input from devices ****
 23706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23707                                  ;   Indicate that there is no more I/O occurring through another SFT outside
 23708                                  ;   of handles 0 and 1
 23709                                  ;
 23710                                  ;   Inputs:	DS is DOSDATA
 23711                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set to false.
 23712                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23713                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23714                                  
 23715                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 3CF8h
 23716                                  
 23717                                  ; DOSCODE:71E3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23718                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23719                                  
 23720                                  ; DOSCODE:71CFh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23721                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 23732                                  ;
 23733                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisSFT as the sft of the desired file
 23734                                  ;		DS is DOSDATA
 23735                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set.  CONSFT = ThisSFT.
 23736                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23737                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23738

 23740                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 23741                                  	;push	es
 23742                                  	;push	di
 23743                                  	;mov	byte [CONSWAP],1
 23744                                  	;les	di,[THISSFT]
 23745                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT],di
 23746                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT+2],es
 23747                                  	;pop	di

 23761                                  ; DOSCODE:71FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23762                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23763                                  
 23764                                  ;Break	<DOS_READ -- MAIN READ ROUTINE AND DEVICE IN ROUTINES>
 23765                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23766                                  ;
 23767                                  ; Inputs:
 23768                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 23769                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 23770                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to read
 23771                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 23772                                  ; Function:
 23773                                  ;	Perform read operation
 23774                                  ; Outputs:
 23775                                  ;    Carry clear
 23776                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 23777                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes read
 23778                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 23779                                  ;    Carry set
 23780                                  ;	AX is error code
 23781                                  ;	CX = 0
 23782                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 23783                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 23784                                  ;
 23785                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23786                                  
 23787                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is be set up.
 23788                                  
 23789                                  ; DOSCODE:71E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23790                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23791                                  
 23792                                  ; 07/02/2024
 23793                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23794                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7B76h
 23795                                  
 23796                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7997h)
 23797                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:71FDh)
 23798                                  
 23799                                  DOS_READ:
 23800 00003A47 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 23801                                  
 23802                                  ; Verify that the sft has been opened in a mode that allows reading.
 23803                                  
 23804                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+2]
 23805 00003A4B 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 23806                                  	;;and	al,0Fh	; (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.22)

 24329                                  ;Break	<DOS_WRITE -- MAIN WRITE ROUTINE AND DEVICE OUT ROUTINES>
 24330                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24331                                  ;
 24332                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_WRITE
 24333                                  ;
 24334                                  ; Inputs:
 24335                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 24336                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 24337                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to write
 24338                                  ; Function:
 24339                                  ;	Perform write operation
 24340                                  ;	NOTE: If CX = 0 on input, file is truncated or grown
 24341                                  ;		to current sf_position
 24342                                  ; Outputs:
 24343                                  ;    Carry clear
 24344                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24345                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes written
 24346                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24347                                  ;    Carry set
 24348                                  ;	AX is error code
 24349                                  ;	CX = 0
 24350                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24351                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24352                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24353                                  	
 24354                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24355                                  ; DOSCODE:742Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24356                                  
 24357                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24358                                  ; DOSCODE:7418h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24359                                  
 24360                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24361                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7D8Fh
 24362                                  
 24363                                  DOS_WRITE:
 24364 00003C48 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24365                                  	;mov	al,[ES:DI+2]
 24366 00003C4C 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24367                                  	;;and	al,0Fh
 24368                                  	;AND	AL,access_mask
 24369                                  	; 07/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0

 24375                                  BadMode:
 24376 00003C56 E96304                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24377                                  
 24378                                  ; NOTE: The following check for writting to a Read Only File is performed
 24379                                  ;	    ONLY on FCBs!!!!
 24380                                  ;	We ALLOW writes to Read Only files via handles to allow a CREATE
 24381                                  ;	    of a read only file which can then be written to.
 24382                                  ;	This is OK because we are NOT ALLOWED to OPEN a RO file via handles
 24383                                  ;	    for writting, or RE-CREATE an EXISTING RO file via handles. Thus,
 24384                                  ;	    CREATing a NEW RO file, or RE-CREATing an existing file which
 24385                                  ;	    is NOT RO to be RO, via handles are the only times we can write
 24386                                  ;	    to a read-only file.
 24387                                  
 24388                                  Check_FCB_RO:
 24389                                  	;;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 24390                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 24391                                  	;JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24392                                  	
 24393                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 24394 00003C59 26F6450380              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],(sf_isFCB>>8)
 24395 00003C5E 7407                    	JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24396                                  
 24397                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],1

 24399 00003C65 75EF                    	JNZ	short BadMode 		; Can't write to Read_Only files via FCB
 24400                                  WRITE_NO_MODE:

 24402 00003C6A E8B2DB                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24403 00003C6D 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_WRITE
 24404                                  
 24405                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24406                                  ;	transfer NET_WRITE
 24407                                  ;ELSE
 24408                                  	;mov	ax,1109h
 24409 00003C6F B80911                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|9
 24410 00003C72 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - WRITE TO REMOTE FILE
 24411                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24412                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24413                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24414                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes written
 24415 00003C74 C3                      	retn
 24416                                  ;ENDIF

 24658                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24659                                  ;
 24660                                  ; Procedure Name : get_io_sft
 24661                                  ;
 24662                                  ;   Convert JFN number in BX to sf_entry in DS:SI We get the normal SFT if
 24663                                  ;   CONSWAP is FALSE or if the handle desired is 2 or more. Otherwise, we
 24664                                  ;   retrieve the sft from ConSFT which is set by SwapCon.
 24665                                  ;
 24666                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24667                                  
 24668                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24669                                  ; DOSCODE:7583h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24670                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24671                                  ; DOSCODE:756Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24672                                  
 24673                                  GET_IO_SFT:
 24674                                  	;test	byte [SS:CONSWAP],0FFh
 24675 00003D99 36803E[5703]00          	cmp	byte [SS:CONSWAP],0			;smr;SS Override
 24676 00003D9F 7512                    	JNZ	short GetRedir
 24677                                  GetNormal:
 24678 00003DA1 16                      	push	ss
 24679 00003DA2 1F                      	pop	ds
 24680 00003DA3 06                      	PUSH	ES
 24681 00003DA4 57                      	PUSH	DI
 24682 00003DA5 E8AF35                  	call	SFFromHandle
 24683 00003DA8 7206                    	JC	short RET44P
 24684 00003DAA 8CC6                    	MOV	SI,ES
 24685 00003DAC 8EDE                    	MOV	DS,SI
 24686 00003DAE 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24687                                  RET44P:
 24688 00003DB0 5F                      	POP	DI
 24689 00003DB1 07                      	POP	ES
 24690 00003DB2 C3                      	retn
 24691                                  GetRedir:
 24692 00003DB3 83FB01                  	CMP	BX,1
 24693 00003DB6 77E9                    	JA	short GetNormal
 24694 00003DB8 36C536[E605]            	LDS	SI,[SS:CONSFT]
 24695 00003DBD F8                      	CLC
 24696                                  get_io_sft_retn:
 24697 00003DBE C3                      	retn
 24698                                  
 24699                                  ;Break	<DIRREAD -- READ A DIRECTORY SECTOR>
 24700                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24701                                  ;
 24702                                  ; Procedure Name : DIRREAD
 24703                                  ;
 24704                                  ; Inputs:
 24705                                  ;	AX = Directory block number (relative to first block of directory)
 24706                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 24707                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = First sector of first cluster of directory
 24708                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster
 24709                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 24710                                  ; Function:
 24711                                  ;	Read the directory block into [CURBUF].
 24712                                  ; Outputs:
 24713                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM] = Next cluster (after the one skipped to)
 24714                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] Set
 24715                                  ;	ES:BP unchanged
 24716                                  ;	[CURBUF] Points to Buffer with dir sector
 24717                                  ;	Carry set if error (user said FAIL to I 24)
 24718                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed.
 24719                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24720                                  
 24721                                  ;hkn; called from dir.asm. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 24722                                  
 24723                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24724                                  
 24725                                  DIRREAD:
 24726                                  
 24727                                  ; Note that ClusFac is the sectors per cluster. This is NOT necessarily
 24728                                  ; the same as what is in the DPB! In the case of the root directory, we have
 24729                                  ; ClusFac = # sectors in the root directory. The root directory is detected
 24730                                  ; by DIRStart = 0.
 24731                                  
 24732 00003DBF 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 24733                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 24734 00003DC1 3916[DC0A]              	cmp	[DIRSTART_HW],dx
 24735 00003DC5 7509                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24736                                  	;CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 24737                                  	; 21/09/2023
 24738 00003DC7 3916[C205]              	cmp	[DIRSTART],dx ; 0
 24739 00003DCB 7503                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24740 00003DCD 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24741 00003DCE EB0C                    	JMP	short DoRead
 24742                                  
 24743                                  ; Convert the sector number in AX into cluster and sector-within-cluster pair
 24744                                  
 24745                                  SubDir:
 24746 00003DD0 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL
 24747                                  	;and	dl,[es:bp+4]
 24748 00003DD2 26225604                	AND	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24749                                  
 24750                                  ;	(DX) = sector-in-cluster
 24751                                  
 24752                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]

 24964                                  ;Break	<DREAD -- DO A DISK READ>
 24965                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24966                                  ;
 24967                                  ; Procedure Name : DREAD
 24968                                  ;
 24969                                  ; Inputs:
 24970                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 24971                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 24972                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	      (LOW)
 24973                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 24974                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 24975                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case call to HARDERR needed
 24976                                  ; Function:
 24977                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk read. If BIOS reports
 24978                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 24979                                  ; Outputs:
 24980                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILED to INT 24)
 24981                                  ; DS,ES:BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 24982                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 24988                                  ;hkn; SS override

 24990 00003EC9 E89A00                  	call	HARDERRRW

 24992 00003ECE 74EE                    	JZ	short DREAD

 25033                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25034                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],8
 25035 00003EDE 26F6450408              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_volume_id ;volume id
 25036                                  	;JZ	short write_cont			     ;no
 25037                                  	;;call	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25038                                  	;;retn
 25039                                  	;;jnz	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 25041                                  	;jz	short write_cont
 25042                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25043                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25044 00003EE3 7403                    	JZ	short write_cont
 25045                                  	;call	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25046                                  	;retn
 25047                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25048 00003EE5 E9D201                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25049                                  
 25050                                  write_cont:				;
 25051 00003EE8 51                      	PUSH	CX			;save reg
 25052 00003EE9 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;
 25053 00003EEB 7501                    	JNZ	short Not_Truncate	;
 25054 00003EED 49                      	dec	cx			;(cx) = -1; check for lock on whole file
 25055                                  Not_Truncate:				;
 25056 00003EEE B080                    	MOV	AL,80H			;check write access
 25057 00003EF0 E87541                  	call	LOCK_CHECK		;check lock
 25058 00003EF3 59                      	POP	CX			;restore reg
 25059 00003EF4 7305                    	JNC	short WRITE_OK		;lock ok
 25060 00003EF6 E87301                  	call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION	;issue I24
 25061 00003EF9 73ED                    	JNC	short write_cont	;retry
 25062                                  WRITE_OK:				;
 25063 00003EFB C3                      	retn				;

 25112                                  ;	TITLE	DISK2 - Disk utility routines
 25113                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 25114                                  
 25115                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 25116                                  ;
 25117                                  ;	DskRead
 25118                                  ;	DWRITE
 25119                                  ;	DSKWRITE
 25120                                  ;	HarderrRW
 25121                                  ;	SETUP
 25122                                  ;	BREAKDOWN
 25123                                  ;	READ_LOCK_VIOLATION
 25124                                  ;	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION
 25125                                  ;	DISKREAD
 25126                                  ;	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25127                                  ;	SET_ACC_ERR
 25128                                  ;	SETSFT
 25129                                  ;	SETCLUS
 25130                                  ;	AddRec
 25131                                  ;
 25132                                  ;	Revision history:
 25133                                  ;
 25134                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 25135                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 25136                                  
 25137                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25138                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25139                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25140                                  ; DOSCODE:7685h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25141                                  
 25142                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 25143                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25144                                  ;
 25145                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 25146                                  ;
 25147                                  ; Inputs:
 25148                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25149                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25150                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25151                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25152                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25153                                  ; Function:
 25154                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25155                                  ; Outputs:
 25156                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25157                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25158                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25159                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25160                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25161                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25162                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25163                                  
 25164                                  DSKREAD:
 25165 00003F13 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25166                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25167 00003F14 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25168                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25169 00003F18 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25170 00003F1C 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25171 00003F1D 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25172 00003F1E E8D710                  	call	SETREAD
 25173 00003F21 EB22                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 25174                                  
 25175                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 25176                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25177                                  ;
 25178                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 25179                                  ;
 25180                                  ; Inputs:
 25181                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25182                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25183                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25184                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25185                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25186                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 25187                                  ; Function:
 25188                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 25189                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25190                                  ; Output:
 25191                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 25192                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25194                                  
 25195                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 25196                                  DWRITE:
 25197 00003F23 E81100                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 25198 00003F26 74EA                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 25199                                  
 25200                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25201 00003F28 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1	; Write
 25202 00003F2E E83500                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25203 00003F31 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25204 00003F33 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 25205                                  
 25206                                  ; 09/02/2024
 25207                                  %if 0
 25208                                  	CMP	AL,3			; Check for FAIL
 25209                                  	CLC
 25210                                  	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 		; Ignore
 25211                                  	STC
 25212                                  NO_CAR2:
 25213                                  dw_ret_label:
 25214                                  	retn
 25215                                  %else
 25216                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 25217 00003F35 EB99                    	jmp	short fail_ignore
 25218                                  %endif
 25219                                  
 25220                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 25221                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25222                                  ;
 25223                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 25224                                  ;
 25225                                  ; Inputs:
 25226                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25227                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25228                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25229                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25230                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25231                                  ; Function:
 25232                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25233                                  ; Outputs:
 25234                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25235                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25236                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25237                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25238                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25239                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25240                                  ;
 25241                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25242                                  
 25243                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 25244                                  DSKWRITE:
 25245 00003F37 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25246                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25247 00003F38 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25248                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25249 00003F3C 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25250 00003F40 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25251 00003F41 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25252 00003F42 E8E610                  	call	SETWRITE
 25253                                  DODSKOP:
 25254 00003F45 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS

 25334                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 25335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25336                                  ;
 25337                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 25338                                  ;
 25339                                  ; Inputs:
 25340                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 25341                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 25342                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 25343                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25344                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 25345                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 25346                                  ; Outputs:
 25347                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 25348                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 25349                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 25350                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 25351                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 25352                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 25353                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 25354                                  ;
 25355                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 25356                                  ;
 25357                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 25358                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 25359                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 25360                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 25361                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 25362                                  ;
 25363                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 25364                                  ;	   CX = 0
 25365                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 25366                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 25367                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 25368                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25369                                  
 25370                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 25371                                  
 25372                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25373

 25375                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25376

 25515                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>

 26094                                  ; 25/07/2018
 26095                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 26096                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 26097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26098                                  ;
 26099                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 26100                                  ;
 26101                                  ; Inputs:
 26102                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 26103                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26104                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26105                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 26106                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26107                                  ;
 26108                                  ; Function:
 26109                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 26110                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 26111                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 26112                                  ;
 26113                                  ; Outputs:
 26114                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 26115                                  ;
 26116                                  ; Uses:
 26117                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 26118                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26119                                  ;
 26120                                  ; Notes:
 26121                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 26122                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 26123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26124                                  ;M039: Created
 26125                                  
 26126                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26127                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26128                                  
 26129                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26130                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26131                                  
 26132                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26133                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8313h
 26134                                  
 26135                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 26136                                  ;
 26137                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 26138                                  
 26139                                  DskRdBufScan:
 26140 000041A5 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 26141 000041AB 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 26142                                  
 26143 000041AD 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 26144 000041B2 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 26145 000041B4 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 26146 000041B6 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 26147                                  
 26148 000041B9 E8A223                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 26149                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 26150 000041BC 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 26151 000041BF 36A3[1B11]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 26152                                  		
 26153                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26154                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26155                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 26156                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26157 000041C3 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 26158                                  
 26159                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 26160                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 26161                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 26162                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 26163                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 26164                                  
 26165                                  bufq:	
 26166                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 26167 000041C7 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 26168 000041CA 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 26169                                  
 26170                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26171                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 26172                                  
 26173                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 26174 000041CC 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26175 000041CF 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 26176                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 26177 000041D1 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26178                                  bufq01:
 26179 000041D4 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 26180                                  
 26181                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26182                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 26183                                  
 26184                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 26185 000041D6 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26186 000041D9 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 26187                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 26188 000041DB 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26189                                  bufq02:
 26190 000041DE 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 26191                                  bufq1:	
 26192 000041E0 363B3E[1B11]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 26193 000041E5 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 26194                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 26195 000041E7 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 26196                                  bufx:
 26197 000041E9 C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 26198                                  
 26199                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 26200                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 26201                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 26202                                  
 26203                                  bufq2:	
 26204 000041EA 50                      	push	ax
 26205                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 26206 000041EB F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 26207 000041EF 7430                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 26208                                  
 26209                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 26210 000041F1 51                      	push	cx

 27299                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 27300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27301                                  ;
 27302                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 27303                                  ;
 27304                                  ; Inputs:
 27305                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 27306                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 27307                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 27308                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 27309                                  ;
 27310                                  ; Function:
 27311                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 27312                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 27313                                  ;
 27314                                  ; Outputs:
 27315                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 27316                                  ; Uses:
 27317                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 27318                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 27319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27320                                  ;M039: Created
 27321                                  
 27322                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 27323                                  ;
 27324                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 27325                                  
 27326                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27327                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27328                                  
 27329                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27330                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27331                                  
 27332                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27333                                  ; DOSCODE:8714h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27334                                  
 27335                                  ; NOTE: Secondary (Buffer) Cache is not used in PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27336                                  
 27337                                  ; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:BB93h)
 27338                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - DOSCODE:7C0Eh)
 27339                                  
 27340                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 27341                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 27342 00004575 53                      	push	bx
 27343 00004576 51                      	push	cx
 27344                                  
 27345 00004577 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 27346 0000457C 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 27347 0000457E 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 27348 00004580 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27349                                  
 27350                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27351                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27352                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 27353                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27354 00004583 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 27355                                  
 27356                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27357                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27358                                  %if 0
 27359                                  
 27360                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 27361                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27362                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 27363                                  
 27364                                  	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 27365                                  	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27366                                  
 27367                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 27368                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 27369                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 27370                                  
 27371                                  	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 27372                                  	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27373                                  
 27374                                  	push    ax
 27375                                  	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 27376                                  	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 27377                                  
 27378                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 27379                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27380                                  
 27381                                  	cmp	si,di
 27382                                  	jne	short sc01
 27383                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 27384                                  sc01: 
 27385                                  	jbe	short sc5
 27386                                  
 27387                                  	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 27388                                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 27389                                  	
 27390                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 27391                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27392                                  
 27393                                  	cmp	bx,di
 27394                                  	jne	short sc02
 27395                                  	cmp	dx,ax
 27396                                  sc02:
 27397                                  	jnb	short sc5
 27398                                  
 27399                                  	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 27400                                  sc5:	
 27401                                  	pop     ax
 27402                                  
 27403                                  %endif
 27404                                  
 27405                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 27406                                  ;	written.
 27407                                  
 27408                                  nosc:	
 27409 00004587 E8D41F                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 27410                                  
 27411                                  _bufq:	
 27412                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 27413 0000458A 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 27414 0000458D 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 27415                                  
 27416                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27417                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 27418                                  
 27419                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 27420 0000458F 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27421 00004592 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 27422                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 27423 00004594 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27424                                  bufq04:
 27425 00004597 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 27426                                  
 27427                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27428                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 27429                                  
 27430                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 27431 00004599 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27432 0000459C 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 27433                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 27434 0000459E 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27435                                  bufq05:
 27436 000045A1 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 27437                                  
 27438                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 27439                                  
 27440                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 27441 000045A3 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 27442 000045A7 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 27443 000045A9 E8C922                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 27444                                  bufq4:
 27445                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 27446 000045AC C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 27447                                  
 27448 000045B1 E8BC1F                  	call	SCANPLACE
 27449 000045B4 EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 27450                                  bufq5: 
 27451 000045B6 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 27452                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 27453                                  bufq6: 
 27454 000045B8 363B3E[1B11]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 27455 000045BD 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 27456                                  	
 27457                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 27458 000045BF 59                      	pop	cx
 27459 000045C0 5B                      	pop	bx
 27460 000045C1 C3                      	retn
 27461                                  
 27462                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 27463                                  
 27464                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 27465                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27466                                  ;
 27467                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 27468                                  ;
 27469                                  ; Inputs:
 27470                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 27471                                  ; Function:
 27472                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 27473                                  ; Outputs:
 27474                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 27475                                  ; Uses:
 27476                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 27477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27478                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 27479                                  
 27480                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27481                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27482                                  
 27483                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27484                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27485                                  
 27486                                  DIV32:
 27487 000045C2 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 27488 000045C6 7515                    	jne	short div5
 27489                                  
 27490 000045C8 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 27491 000045CA 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 27492 000045CC 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 27493 000045D0 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 27494 000045D2 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 27495 000045D4 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 27496 000045D6 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 27497 000045D8 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 27498 000045DA D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 27499 000045DC C3                      	retn
 27500                                  div5:	
 27501 000045DD 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 27502 000045DF 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 27503 000045E1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 27504 000045E3 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 27505 000045E5 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 27506 000045E6 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 27507 000045E8 C3                      	retn
 27508                                  
 27509                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 27510                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27511                                  ;
 27512                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 27513                                  ;
 27514                                  ; Inputs:
 27515                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 27516                                  ; Function:
 27517                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 27518                                  ; Outputs:
 27519                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 27520                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 27521                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 27522                                  ; Uses:
 27523                                  ;       DX,CX
 27524                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27525                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 27526                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 27527                                  
 27528                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27529                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27530                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27531                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27532                                  
 27533                                  SHR32:
 27534                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 27535 000045E9 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 27536 000045ED 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 27537 000045EF E306                    	jcxz	norota
 27538                                  rotashft2:
 27539 000045F1 D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 27540 000045F3 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 27541 000045F5 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 27542                                  norota:
 27543 000045F7 C3                      	retn
 27544                                  
 27545                                  ;============================================================================
 27546                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 27547                                  ;============================================================================
 27548                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27549                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27550                                  
 27551                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 27552                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 27553                                  
 27554                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 27555                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27556                                  ;
 27557                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 27558                                  ;
 27559                                  ; Inputs:
 27560                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 27561                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 27562                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 27563                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 27564                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 27565                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 27566                                  ; Function:
 27567                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 27568                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 27569                                  ; Outputs:
 27570                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 27571                                  ;	ELSE
 27572                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 27573                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 27574                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 27575                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 27576                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 27577                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 27578                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 27579                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 27580                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 27581                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 27582                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 27583                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27584                                  
 27585                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 27586                                  ;hkn; this point.
 27587                                  
 27588                                  SEARCH:
 27589                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27590                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27591                                  
 27592                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27593                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27594                                  
 27595                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27596                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h
 27597                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27598                                  
 27599                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27600                                  
 27601                                  	; 13/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27602                                  	; DOSCODE:8797h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27603                                  
 27604                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 27605                                  FINDENTRY:
 27606 000045F8 E8DE05                  	call	STARTSRCH
 27607 000045FB A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 27608                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 27609 000045FE 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 27610                                  	;cmp	al,8
 27611 00004600 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 27612 00004602 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 27613 00004604 E83402                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 27614                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 27615 00004607 E84C01                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 27616                                  	;JNC	short SRCH
 27617                                  	;JMP	SETESRET
 27618                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27619 0000460A 724F                    	jc	short SETESRET
 27620                                  
 27621                                  	;entry	Srch
 27622                                  SRCH:
 27623                                  	;;;
 27624                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27625 0000460C C706[A50A]0000          	mov     word [LNE_COUNT],0	; reset long name entry count
 27626                                  SRCH2:
 27627                                  	;;;
 27628                                  
 27629 00004612 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 27630 00004613 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 27631                                  
 27632                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 27633                                  
 27634 00004617 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 27635                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 27636 00004619 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 27637 0000461B 7461                    	JZ	short FREE
 27638                                  
 27639                                  	;;;
 27640                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27641 0000461D 50                      	push	ax

 27736                                  ; ATTRIB	Action

 27788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27789                                  ;
 27790                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 27791                                  ;
 27792                                  ; Inputs:
 27793                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 27794                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 27795                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 27796                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 27797                                  ; Function:
 27798                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 27799                                  ; Outputs:
 27800                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 27801                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 27802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27803                                  
 27804                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27805                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27806                                  
 27807                                  MetaCompare:
 27808 000046D0 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 27809                                  WILDCRD:
 27810 000046D3 F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 27811 000046D5 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 27812                                  CHECK_META:
 27813 000046D7 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 27814 000046DC 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 27815                                  MetaRet:
 27816 000046DE C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 27817

 27840

 27843

 27860 000046F7 833E[DC0A]00            	cmp	word [DIRSTART_HW],0

 27862                                  	;cmp	ax,[es:bp+9]
 27863 000046FE 263B4609                	cmp	ax,[es:bp+DPB.ROOT_ENTRIES] ; Number of root dir entries
 27864                                  	;jnb	short NONE
 27865                                  	;jmp	short GETENT
 27866 00004702 7255                    	jb	short GETENT
 27867                                  NONE:		; 14/02/2024
 27868 00004704 F9                      	stc
 27869 00004705 C3                      	retn
 27870

 27872                                  	;;;

 27874 00004706 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]

 27877 00004710 7223                    	JB	short SAMECLUS

 27961                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27962                                  ;
 27963                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 27964                                  ;
 27965                                  ; Inputs:
 27966                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 27967                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 27968                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 27969                                  ; Function:
 27970                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 27971                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 27972                                  ; Outputs:
 27973                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 27974                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 27975                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 27976                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 27977                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27979                                  
 27980                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27981                                  GETENTRY:
 27982                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27983 00004756 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 27984                                  
 27985                                  	;entry	GETENT
 27986                                  GETENT:
 27987 00004759 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 27988                                  ;
 27989                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 27990                                  ; directory.
 27991                                  ;
 27992 0000475C B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 27993 0000475E D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 27994 00004760 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 27995                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27996                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 27997                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27998                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 27999                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28000 00004762 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 28001 00004764 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 28002                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 28003                                  ;
 28004                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 28005                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 28006                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 28007                                  ;
 28008                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 28009 00004767 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 28010 0000476B 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 28011                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 28012 0000476E F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 28013                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28014                                  	;MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 28015                                  				; NOTE: This BX value is not used in DIRREAD
 28016                                  				; Erdogan Tan - 14/02/2024
 28017                                  	;PUSH	BX
 28018 00004770 52                      	push	dx
 28019                                  	;
 28020 00004771 E84BF6                  	call	DIRREAD
 28021 00004774 5B                      	POP	BX
 28022                                  	;retc
 28023 00004775 72BD                    	jc	short nextentry_retn
 28024                                  SETENTRY:
 28025 00004777 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 28026                                  	;;;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 28027                                  	;;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 28028                                  	;add	dx,24 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 14/02/2024	
 28029 0000477B 83C218                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 28030 0000477E 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 28031                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 28032 00004780 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 28033                                  	; 29/12/2022
 28034                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS contains a 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:7E15h
 28035                                  	; 27/06/2024
 28036                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM contains 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:8931h
 28037 00004784 F8                      	clc
 28038 00004785 C3                      	retn
 28039                                  
 28040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28041                                  
 28042                                  ; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28043                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8933h
 28044                                  
 28045                                  sft_fcb_table:
 28046 00004786 00<rep 14h>             	times 20 db 0
 28047                                  sftfcb.cluster:
 28048 0000479A 00000000                	dd	0
 28049                                  sftfcb.direntry:
 28050 0000479E 0000                    	dw	0
 28051                                  sftfcb_entry_size equ $ - sftfcb.cluster ; = 6
 28052                                  
 28053 000047A0 00<rep 72h>             	times 114 db 0	; 6*20 = 120 ; entry size = 6 bytes 
 28054                                  
 28055                                  SRCH_CLUSTER:
 28056 00004812 0000                    	dw	0
 28057                                  SRCH_CLUSTER_HW:
 28058 00004814 0000                    	dw	0

 28062                                  ;Break	<SETDIRSRCH SETROOTSRCH -- Set Search environments>
 28063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28064                                  ;
 28065                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDIRSRCH,SETROOTSRCH
 28066                                  ;
 28067                                  ; Inputs:
 28068                                  ;	BX cluster number of start of directory
 28069                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28070                                  ;	DI next cluster number from fastopen extended info. DOS 3.3 only
 28071                                  ; Function:
 28072                                  ;	Set up a directory search
 28073                                  ; Outputs:
 28074                                  ;	[DIRSTART] = BX
 28075                                  ;	[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC] set
 28076                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28077                                  ; destroys AX,DX,BX
 28078                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28079                                  
 28080                                  	;;;
 28081                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28082                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:89C3h
 28083                                  	;;;
 28084                                  SETDIRSRCH:
 28085 00004816 A1[EE0A]                	mov	ax,[ROOTCLUST_HW]

 28088 0000481B 7504                    	jnz	short SETDIRSRCH_FAT32

 28097

 28099                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 28100 0000482B 268A4604                	mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28101                                  	;inc	al
 28102 0000482F 40                      	inc	ax
 28103 00004830 A2[7705]                	mov	[CLUSFAC],al
 28104                                  
 28105 00004833 56                      	push	si

 28108                                  	;;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 28109                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 28110                                  	;jnz	short UNP_OK
 28111
