 30498                                  SETREAD:
 30499 00004FF8 57                      	PUSH	DI
 30500 00004FF9 51                      	PUSH	CX
 30501 00004FFA 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30502 00004FFB B104                    	MOV	CL,DEVRD ; mov cl,4
 30503                                  SETCALLHEAD:
 30504 00004FFD B016                    	MOV	AL,DRDWRHL ; mov al,16h
 30505 00004FFF 16                      	PUSH	SS
 30506 00005000 07                      	POP	ES
 30507                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 30508 00005001 BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 30509                                  
 30510 00005004 AA                      	STOSB				; length
 30511 00005005 58                      	POP	AX			; 
 30512 00005006 AA                      	STOSB				; Unit
 30513 00005007 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30514 00005008 88C8                    	MOV	AL,CL
 30515 0000500A AA                      	STOSB				; Command code
 30516 0000500B 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 30517 0000500D AB                      	STOSW				; Status
 30518 0000500E 83C708                  	ADD	DI,8			; Skip link fields
 30519 00005011 58                      	POP	AX
 30520 00005012 86C4                    	XCHG	AH,AL
 30521 00005014 AA                      	STOSB				; Media byte
 30522 00005015 86E0                    	XCHG	AL,AH
 30523 00005017 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30524 00005018 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX
 30525 0000501A AB                      	STOSW
 30526                                  
 30527 0000501B 8CD8                    	MOV	AX,DS
 30528 0000501D AB                      	STOSW				; Transfer addr
 30529                                  
 30530 0000501E 59                      	POP	CX			; Real AX
 30531 0000501F 58                      	POP	AX			; Real CX
 30532 00005020 AB                      	STOSW				; Count
 30533                                  
 30534 00005021 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX			; AX=Real DX, DX=real CX, CX=real AX
 30535 00005022 AB                      	STOSW				; Start
 30536 00005023 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX
 30537 00005024 87CA                    	XCHG	DX,CX
 30538 00005026 5F                      	POP	DI
 30539                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 30540 00005027 BB[5A03]                	MOV	BX,DEVCALL
 30541 0000502A C3                      	retn
 30542                                  
 30543                                  	;entry	SETWRITE
 30544                                  SETWRITE:
 30545                                  
 30546                                  ; Inputs:
 30547                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer Address
 30548                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 30549                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 30550                                  ;	AH = Media Byte
 30551                                  ;	AL = Unit Code
 30552                                  ; Function:
 30553                                  ;	Set up the device call header at DEVCALL
 30554                                  ; Output:
 30555                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30556                                  ; No other registers effected
 30557                                  
 30558 0000502B 57                      	PUSH	DI
 30559 0000502C 51                      	PUSH	CX
 30560 0000502D 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30561 0000502E B108                    	MOV	CL,DEVWRT ; mov cl,8
 30562 00005030 36020E[FF02]            	ADD	CL,[SS:VERFLG]		; SS override
 30563 00005035 EBC6                    	JMP	SHORT SETCALLHEAD
 30564                                  
 30565                                  ; 22/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30566                                  %if 0	; SC
 30567                                  
 30568                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30569                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30570                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30571                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30572                                  
 30573                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30574                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30575                                  ;
 30576                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30577                                  ;
 30578                                  ; Inputs:
 30579                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30580                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30581                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30582                                  ; Function:
 30583                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30584                                  ; Output:
 30585                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30586                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30587                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30588                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30589                                  ;
 30590                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30591                                  
 30592                                  RW_SC:
 30593                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30594                                  	
 30595                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30596                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30597                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30598                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30599                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30600                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30601                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30602                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30603                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30604                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30605                                  
 30606                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30607                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30608                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30609                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30610                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30611                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30612                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30613                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30614                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30615                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30616                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30617                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30618                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30619                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30620                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30621                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30622                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30623                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30624                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30625                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30626                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30627                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30628                                  chklow: 						
 30629                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30630                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30631                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30632                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30633                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30634                                  readsr:
 30635                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30636                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30637                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30638                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30639                                  
 30640                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30641                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30642                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30643                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30644                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30645                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30646                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30647                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30648                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30649                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30650                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30651                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30652                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30653                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30654                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30655                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30656                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30657                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30658                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30659                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30660                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30661                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30662                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30663                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30664                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30665                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30666                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30667                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30668                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30669                                  
 30670                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30671                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30672                                  ;
 30673                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30674                                  ;
 30675                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30676                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30677                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30678                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30679                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30680                                  ; Function:
 30681                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30682                                  ; Output:
 30683                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30684                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30685                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30686                                  ;
 30687                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30688                                  
 30689                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30690                                  IN_SC:
 30691                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30692                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30693                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30694                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30695                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30696                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30697                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30698                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30699                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30700                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30701                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30702                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30703                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30704                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30705                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30706                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30707                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30708                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30709                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30710                                  
 30711                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30712                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30713                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30714                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30715                                  
 30716                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30717                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30718                                  ;
 30719                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30720                                  ;
 30721                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30722                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30723                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30724                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30725                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30726                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30727                                  ;
 30728                                  ; Function:
 30729                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30730                                  ; Output:
 30731                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30732                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30733                                  
 30734                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30735                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30736                                  
 30737                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30738                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30739                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30740                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30741                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30742                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30743                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30744                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30745                                  
 30746                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30747                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30748                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30749                                  
 30750                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30751                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30752                                  ;
 30753                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30754                                  ;
 30755                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30756                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30757                                  ; Function:
 30758                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30759                                  ; Output:
 30760                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30761                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30762                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30763                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30764                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30765                                  ;     
 30766                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30767                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30768                                  
 30769                                  VIRREAD:
 30770                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30771                                  
 30772                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30773                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30774                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30775                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30776                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30777                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30778                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30779                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30780                                  
 30781                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30782                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30783                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30784                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30785                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30786                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30787                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30788                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30789                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30790                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30791                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30792                                  	POP	CX
 30793                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30794                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30795                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30796                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30797                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30798                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30799                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30800                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30801                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30802                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30803                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30804                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30805                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30806                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30807                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30808                                  
 30809                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30810                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30811                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30812                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30813                                  
 30814                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30815                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30816                                  ;
 30817                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30818                                  ;
 30819                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30820                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30821                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30822                                  ; Function:
 30823                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30824                                  ; Output:
 30825                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30826                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30827                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30828                                  
 30829                                  SC2BUF:
 30830                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30831                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30832                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30833                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30834                                  	jc	short sexit
 30835                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30836                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30837                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30838                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30839                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30840                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30841                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30842                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30843                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30844                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30845                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30846                                  	mul	cx
 30847                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30848                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30849                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30850                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30851                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30852                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30853                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30854                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30855                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30856                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30857                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30858                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30859                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30860                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30861                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30862                                  nodd:
 30863                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30864                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30865                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30866                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30867                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30868                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30869                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30870                                  
 30871                                  %endif	; SC

 30880                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 30881                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 30882                                  
 30883                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 30884                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30885                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 30886                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 30887                                  ;
 30888                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 30889                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 30890                                  ;	MakeNode
 30891                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 30892                                  ;	FREEENT
 30893                                  ;	NEWDIR
 30894                                  ;	DOOPEN
 30895                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 30896                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN

 30903                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30905                                  ;
 30906                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30907                                  ;
 30908                                  ; Inputs:
 30909                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30910                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30911                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30912                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30913                                  ;               entries
 30914                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30915                                  ; Function:
 30916                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30917                                  ; Outputs:
 30918                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30919                                  ;       ELSE
 30920                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30921                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30922                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30923                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30924                                  ;
 30925                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30926                                  
 30927                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30928                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30929                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30930                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30931                                  
 30932                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 30933                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 30934                                  
 30935                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 30939

 31064                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:

 31085 000050D5 C3                      	retn

 31093 000050DF 26804D0504              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR

 31103 000050F0 AA                      	STOSB
 31104                                  EVENZ:

 31106

 31111                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 31113                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;

 31119 000050F2 E86E17                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 31120                                  %endif

 31152                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31153                                  ;
 31154                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31155                                  ;
 31156                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31157                                  ;
 31158                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31159                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31160                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31161                                  ;
 31162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31163                                  
 31164                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31165                                  
 31166                                  SETDOTENT:
 31167                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31168 00005105 AB                      	STOSW
 31169 00005106 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31170 00005109 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31171 0000510C F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31172 0000510E AA                      	STOSB
 31173                                  
 31174                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31175                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31176 0000510F B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31177 00005111 AA                      	STOSB
 31178                                  
 31179                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31180                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31181                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31182                                  	;;;
 31183 00005112 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31184 00005115 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31185 00005118 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31186                                  	;;;	
 31187 00005119 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31188                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31189 0000511D 8B440D                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31190 00005120 AB                      	STOSW
 31191                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31192 00005121 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31193 00005124 AB                      	STOSW
 31194                                  
 31195                                  ;	Set up first cluster field (lw)
 31196 00005125 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31197 00005127 AB                      	STOSW
 31198                                  
 31199                                  ;	0 file size
 31200                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31201 00005128 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; 23/02/2024
 31202 00005129 AB                      	STOSW
 31203 0000512A AB                      	STOSW
 31204 0000512B C3                      	retn

 31206                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31207                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31208                                  ;
 31209                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31210                                  ;
 31211                                  ; Inputs:
 31212                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31213                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31214                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31215                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31216                                  ;
 31217                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31218                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31219                                  ;
 31220                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31221                                  ;               terminated)
 31222                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31223                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31224                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31225                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31226                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31227                                  ; Function:
 31228                                  ;       Make a new node
 31229                                  ; Outputs:
 31230                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31231                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31232                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31233                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31234                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31235                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31236                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31237                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31238                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31239                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31240                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31241                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31242                                  ;       ELSE
 31243                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31244                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31245                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31246                                  ;               containing new node.
 31247                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31248                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31249                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31250                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31251                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31252                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31253                                  ;
 31254                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31255                                  
 31256                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31257                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31258                                  
 31259                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31260                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31261                                  
 31262                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31263                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31264                                  
 31265                                  MakeNode:
 31266                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31267 0000512C C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31268 00005132 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31269 00005133 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31270 00005138 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31271 0000513B E88BF8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31272 0000513E 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31273                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31274                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31275 00005140 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31276 00005141 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31277 00005142 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31278 00005144 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31279 00005146 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31280 00005149 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31281                                  make_err_4:
 31282 0000514B B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31283                                  make_err_ret:
 31284                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31285                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31286 0000514D 98                      	cbw
 31287 0000514E F9                      	STC
 31288                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31289 0000514F C3                      	retn
 31290                                  
 31291                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31292                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31293                                  make_type:
 31294                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31295                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31296                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31297 00005150 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31298 00005155 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31299 00005157 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31300                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31301                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31302 0000515C F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31303 00005161 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31304 00005163 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31305 00005164 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31306                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31307                                  make_retn:
 31308                                  	;return
 31309 00005167 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31310                                  
 31311                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31312                                  
 31313                                  make_type2:
 31314 00005168 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31315 0000516C 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31316 0000516E F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31317 0000516F EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31318                                  
 31319                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31320                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31321                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31322                                  ;   else => file
 31323                                  
 31324                                  make_exists:
 31325 00005171 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31326 00005173 B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31327                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31328 00005175 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31329 0000517A 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31330                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31331                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31332 0000517C 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31333 0000517E 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31334 00005180 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31335 00005182 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31336 00005184 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31337 00005185 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31338                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31339 00005189 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31340                                  	;test	ch,1
 31341 0000518D F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31342 00005190 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 31343 00005192 E858FA                  	call	MatchAttributes
 31344 00005195 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31345 00005196 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31346 00005198 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31347                                  make_share:
 31348                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31349                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31350 0000519A 98                      	cbw
 31351 0000519B 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 31352 0000519C 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 31353 0000519D 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH
 31354 0000519F E83201                  	CALL	DOOPEN		; Fill in SFT for share check
 31355 000051A2 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31356 000051A6 56                      	push	si
 31357 000051A7 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31358 000051A8 E8622F                  	call	ShareEnter
 31359 000051AB 734E                    	jnc	short MakeEndShare
 31360                                  
 31361                                  ; User failed request.
 31362 000051AD 5B                      	pop	bx
 31363 000051AE 5E                      	pop	si
 31364 000051AF 59                      	pop	cx
 31365 000051B0 58                      	pop	ax
 31366                                  
 31367                                  Make_Share_ret:
 31368 000051B1 B006                    	MOV	AL,6
 31369 000051B3 EB98                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31370                                  
 31371                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 31372 000051B5 59                      	POP	CX		; Get back device ID
 31373                                  make_err_ret_5:
 31374 000051B6 B005                    	MOV     AL,5		; Attribute mismatch
 31375                                          ; 22/11/2022
 31376 000051B8 EB93                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31377                                  
 31378                                  make_exists_dir:
 31379 000051BA B001                    	MOV	AL,1		; exists as directory, always an error
 31380                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31381 000051BC EB8F                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31382                                  
 31383                                  make_save:
 31384 000051BE 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save whether Disk or File
 31385 000051BF 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; Device ID to AH
 31386 000051C1 E86800                  	CALL	NEWENTRY

 31388 000051C5 73A0                    	jnc	short make_retn
 31389 000051C7 B002                    	MOV	AL,2		; create failed case 2
 31390                                  make_save_retn:
 31391 000051C9 C3                      	retn
 31392                                  
 31393                                  make_new:
 31394 000051CA E8F1FF                  	call	make_save
 31395 000051CD 72FA                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 31396                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 31397 000051CF F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory

 31399                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 31400 000051D6 50                      	push	ax
 31401 000051D7 53                      	push	bx
 31402 000051D8 56                      	push	si
 31403 000051D9 E8312F                  	call	ShareEnter
 31404 000051DC 5E                      	pop	si
 31405 000051DD 5B                      	pop	bx
 31406 000051DE 58                      	pop	ax
 31407 000051DF 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 31408                                  
 31409                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 31410                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 31411                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 31412                                  
 31413 000051E1 50                      	PUSH	AX
 31414 000051E2 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]

 31417                                  
 31418                                  ; 23/02/2024
 31419                                  %if 0

 31423                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 31427                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31428                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 31429                                  yesdirty8:
 31430                                  %else
 31431                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 31433                                  %endif
 31434 000051ED C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 31435                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31436 000051F1 268A4600                	mov	al,[ES:BP]
 31437                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31438                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 31439                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 31440 000051F5 E84515                  	call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 31441 000051F8 58                      	POP	AX
 31442 000051F9 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31443                                  
 31444                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31445                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31446                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31447                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31448                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31449                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31450                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31451                                  ;
 31452                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31453                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31454                                  
 31455                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31456                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31457                                  
 31458                                  MakeEndShare:
 31459 000051FB C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 31460 000051FF 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 31461 00005201 E87FC6                  	call	ECritSFT
 31462 00005204 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 31463                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31464 00005207 50                      	push	ax
 31465 00005208 57                      	push	di
 31466 00005209 06                      	push	es
 31467 0000520A 9C                      	PUSHF
 31468 0000520B E8FA2E                  	call	ShareEnd		; remove sharing
 31469 0000520E 9D                      	POPF
 31470 0000520F 07                      	pop	es
 31471 00005210 5F                      	pop	di
 31472 00005211 268F05                  	pop	word [ES:DI]
 31473                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31474 00005214 E899C6                  	call	LCritSFT
 31475                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31476                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31477 00005217 5B                      	pop	bx
 31478 00005218 5E                      	pop	si
 31479 00005219 59                      	pop	cx
 31480 0000521A 58                      	pop	ax
 31481 0000521B E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 31482                                  
 31483                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31484                                  
 31485 0000521E 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 31486 00005220 50                      	push	ax
 31487 00005221 53                      	push	bx
 31488 00005222 56                      	push	si
 31489 00005223 9C                      	PUSHF
 31490 00005224 E8E62E                  	call	ShareEnter
 31491 00005227 9D                      	POPF
 31492 00005228 5E                      	pop	si
 31493 00005229 5B                      	pop	bx
 31494 0000522A 58                      	pop	ax
 31495                                  
 31496                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 31497                                  
 31498                                  makeendshare_retn:
 31499 0000522B C3                      	retn
 31500                                  
 31501                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31502                                  ;
 31503                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31504                                  ;
 31505                                  ; Inputs:
 31506                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31507                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31508                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31509                                  ;		  entries
 31510                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31511                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31512                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31513                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31514                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31515                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31516                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31517                                  ;	  If FILE
 31518                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31519                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31520                                  ;	  If device
 31521                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31522                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31523                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31524                                  ; Function:
 31525                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31526                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31527                                  ; Outputs:
 31528                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31529                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31530                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31531                                  ;	  else
 31532                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31533                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31534                                  ;
 31535                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31536                                  
 31537                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31538                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31539                                  
 31540                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31541                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31542                                  
 31543                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31544                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31545                                  
 31546                                  NEWENTRY:

 31688                                  ; DOOPEN
 31689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31690                                  ;
 31691                                  ; Inputs:
 31692                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31693                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31694                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31695                                  ;	  If FILE
 31696                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31697                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31698                                  ;	  If device
 31699                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31700                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31701                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31702                                  ; Function:
 31703                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31704                                  ; Outputs:
 31705                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31706                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31707                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31708                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31709                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31710                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31711                                  ;	  sf_position = 0

 31713                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31714                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 31715                                  ;	  If file
 31716                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31717                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31718                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 31719                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31720                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31721                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31722                                  ;

 31990                                  ;
 31991                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 31992                                  ;
 31993                                  ; Inputs:
 31994                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 31995                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 31996                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 31997                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 31998                                  ; Function:
 31999                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32000                                  ; Outputs:
 32001                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32002                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32003                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32004                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32005                                  
 32006                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 32100                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32101                                  ;
 32102                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32103                                  ;
 32104                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32105                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32106                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32107                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32108                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32109                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32110                                  ;
 32111                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32112                                  
 32113                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32114                                  	PUSH	AX
 32115                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32116                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32117                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32118                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32119                                  	push	es
 32120                                  	push	di
 32121                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32122                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32123                                  	pop	di
 32124                                  	pop	es
 32125                                  
 32126                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32127                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32128                                  	POP	AX
 32129                                  	retn
 32130                                  
 32131                                  %endif

 32165                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 32166                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32167                                  ;
 32168                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32169                                  ;
 32170                                  ; Inputs:
 32171                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 32172                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32173                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 32174                                  ; Outputs:
 32175                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 32176                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 32177                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 32178                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32179                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 32180                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32385                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32386                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32387                                  ;
 32388                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32389                                  ;
 32390                                  ; Inputs:
 32391                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32392                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32393                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32394                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32395                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32396                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32397                                  ; Function:
 32398                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32399                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32400                                  ; Outputs:
 32401                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32402                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32403                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32404                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32405                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32406                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32407                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32408                                  
 32409                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32410                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32411                                  
 32412                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32413                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32414                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32415                                  
 32416                                  BUFSEC:
 32417                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32418                                  	;;;
 32419                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32420 0000549A 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32421                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32422 0000549E 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32423 000054A2 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32424                                  	;;;
 32425 000054A3 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32426 000054A7 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32427                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 32428 000054AB C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 32429 000054B0 E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 32430 000054B3 E81F11                  	call	GETBUFFR
 32431                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32432                                  	;;;
 32433 000054B6 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32434                                  	;;;
 32435 000054BA 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 32436                                  
 32437 000054BC C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 32438 000054C1 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 32439 000054C5 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 32440 000054C7 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 32441 000054CB 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 32442 000054CD 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 32443 000054D1 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 32444                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 32445 000054D5 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 32446                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 32447                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 32448                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 32449 000054DA 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 32450 000054DD 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 32451 000054E1 F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 32452 000054E2 C3                              retn
 32453                                  
 32454                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 32455                                  
 32456                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32457                                  ;
 32458                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 32459                                  ;
 32460                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 32461                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32462                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32463                                  ;
 32464                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 32465                                  ;
 32466                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32467                                  
 32468                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32469                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32470                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32471                                  BUFRD:
 32472 000054E3 06                              PUSH	ES
 32473 000054E4 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector
 32474 000054E6 E8B1FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 32475 000054E9 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 32476                                  
 32477                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 32478 000054EB 07                              POP	ES
 32479 000054EC EB2D                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED ; ds=ss
 32480                                  
 32481                                  BUF_OK:
 32482 000054EE 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 32483 000054F0 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 32484 000054F4 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 32485 000054F6 87F7                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 32486 000054F8 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 32487                                  ;M039
 32488                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32489                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 32490                                  	;MOVSB
 32491                                  ;EVENRD:
 32492                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 32493                                  
 32494                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 32495                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 32496                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 32497                                  
 32498                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32499 000054FA F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 32500                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 32501                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 32502                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32503 000054FC 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 32504 000054FE A4                      	movsb ; ****
 32505                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32506                                  	;adc	cx,0
 32507                                  	;rep	movsb
 32508                                  ;M039
 32509                                  EVENRD: ; ****

 32521 00005511 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 32522                                  ;M039
 32523                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32524                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 32525                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 32526                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 32527 00005513 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 32528                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 32529                                  
 32530                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 32531 00005518 F8                              CLC
 32532                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 32533 00005519 16                      	push	ss
 32534 0000551A 1F                      	pop	ds
 32535                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 32536 0000551B C3                              retn

 32730                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 32731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32732                                  ;
 32733                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 32734                                  ;
 32735                                  ; Inputs:
 32736                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 32737                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 32738                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 32739                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32740                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 32741                                  ; Outputs:
 32742                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining
 32743                                  ;	  BX = Transfer address
 32744                                  ;	  CX = No. or records to be transferred
 32745                                  ;	  DX = Physical sector address (LOW)
 32746                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 32747                                  ;	  DI = Next cluster
 32748                                  ;	  [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 32749                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] updated
 32750                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32751                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 32752                                  ;
 32753                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32754                                  
 32755                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32756                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32757                                  
 32758                                  OPTIMIZE:
 32759 000055BE 52                      	PUSH	DX

 32761                                  	;;;

 32763                                  	;;;

 32768 000055CA 88C4                    	MOV	AH,AL

 32770 000055CE 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 32771                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 32772                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32773                                  	; 16/12/2022
 32774 000055D0 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 32775                                  OPTCLUS:
 32776                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 32777                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 32778                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 32779                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 32780                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 32781                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 32782                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer
 32783
