 33001                                  
 33002                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33003                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33004                                  
 33005                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33006                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset
 33007                                  
 33008                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33009                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33010                                  ;
 33011                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33012                                  ;
 33013                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33014                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33015                                  ;
 33016                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33017                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33018                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33019                                  ;
 33020                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33021                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33022                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33023                                  ;
 33024                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33025                                  ;
 33026                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33027                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33028                                  ;           ELSE
 33029                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33030                                  ;
 33031                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33032                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33033                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33034                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33035                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33036                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33037                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33038                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33039                                  ;   allocated.
 33040                                  ;
 33041                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33042                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33043                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33044                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33045                                  ;
 33046                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33047                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33048                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33049                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33050                                  ;   explanation:
 33051                                  ;
 33052                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33053                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33054                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33055                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33056                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33057                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33058                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33059                                  ;   the
 33060                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33061                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33062                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33063                                  ;
 33064                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33065                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33066                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33067                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33068                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33069                                  ;
 33070                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33071                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33072                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33073                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33074                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33075                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33076                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33077                                  ;
 33078                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33079                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33080                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33081                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33082                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33083                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33084                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null
 33085                                  ;
 33086                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP
 33087                                  
 33088                                  ;callmagic  proc near
 33089                                  ;       push    ds                             ;push segment of routine 
 33090                                  ;       push    Offset MagicPatch              ;push offset for routine
 33091                                  ;       retf                                   ;simulate jmp far
 33092                                  ;                                              ;far return address is on
 33093                                  ;                                              ;stack, so far return from
 33094                                  ;                                              ;call will return this routine
 33095                                  ;callmagic  endp
 33096                                  
 33097                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33098                                  ;PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9AC5h
 33099                                  
 33100                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC2h)
 33101                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C078h)
 33102                                  
 33103                                  ; 07/03/2025
 33104                                  ; 25/09/2023
 33105                                  %if 0	; 27/02/2024
 33106                                  callmagic:
 33107                                  	push	ds
 33108                                  	push	word [ss:OffsetMagicPatch]
 33109                                  	retf	
 33110                                  %endif
 33111                                  
 33112                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33113                                  %if 1
 33114                                  ALLOCATE_X:
 33115 00005685 A3[F00A]                	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],ax
 33116                                  	;jmp	short ALLOCATE
 33117                                  %endif
 33118                                  
 33119                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33120                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9ACFh
 33121                                  
 33122                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC9h)
 33123                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C07Fh)
 33124                                  
 33125                                  ALLOCATE:

 33148                                  	;jmp	Disk_Full_Return
 33149

 33165                                  ;END MAGICDRV MODIFICATIONS

 33169

 33196                                  %if 0
 33197                                          PUSH    CX

 33199                                  
 33200                                          MOV     DX,BX
 33201                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:bp+1Ch]  ; MSDOS 3.3

 33204                                          cmp     bx,2

 33208                                  ;   <2 or >dpb_max_clus. Reset it and restart the scan
 33209                                  
 33210                                  ads1:
 33211                                  	;;mov	word [es:bp+1Ch],2 ; MSDOS 3.3
 33212                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Dh],2 ; MSDOS 6.0
 33213                                          mov     word [ES:BP+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2

 33215                                                                          ;       cluster examined is 2
 33216                                  %else
 33217                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33218                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33219                                  	;;;
 33220 000056A9 FF36[F00A]              	push	word [CCOUNT_HW]
 33221 000056AD 51                      	push	cx
 33222 000056AE FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33223 000056B2 53                      	push	bx
 33224                                  
 33225 000056B3 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 33226                                  
 33227 000056B5 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33228                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx ; 0
 33229 000056B7 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 33230 000056BB 871E[E80A]              	xchg	bx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]

 33244                                  ads1:

 33246 000056DC 7721                    	ja	short FINDFRE
 33247                                  ads2:
 33248 000056DE 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33249                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 33250 000056E0 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 33251 000056E4 750A                    	jnz	short ads3		; not FAT32
 33252                                  
 33253                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+39h],2
 33254 000056E6 26C746390200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],2

 33256 000056EC 26895E3B                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],bx ; 0
 33257                                  ads3:
 33258 000056F0 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 33259                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Dh],2	
 33260 000056F4 26C7461D0200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2
 33261 000056FA 43                      	inc	bx ; 1
 33262                                  	;or	[es:bp+18h],bl
 33263 000056FB 26085E18                	or	[es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],bl ; 1	
 33264                                  	;;;
 33265                                  %endif
 33266                                  
 33267                                  ;   Scanning both forwards and backwards for a free cluster
 33268                                  ;
 33269                                  ;       (BX) = forwards scan pointer
 33270                                  ;       (CX) = clusters remaining to be allocated
 33271                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 33272                                  ;       (TOS) = last cluster of file
 33273                                  
 33274                                  FINDFRE:
 33275                                  %if 0
 33276                                          INC     BX
 33277                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 33278                                          CMP	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 33279                                  	ja	short ads7	; at end of disk
 33280                                          call	UNPACK          ; check out this cluster
 33281                                          jc	short ads4	; FAT error             [INTERR?]
 33282                                          jnz	short FINDFRE	; not free, keep on truckin
 33283                                  
 33284                                  ;   Have found a free cluster. Chain it to the file
 33285                                  ;
 33286                                  ;       (BX) = found free cluster #
 33287                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 33288

 33764                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33765                                  	;jz	short RELEASE_flush
 33766                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33767 0000587E 7652                            jbe	short RET12 ; jna short RET12
 33768                                  				; CCONTENT_HW:DI= Content of FAT
 33769                                   				; for given cluster (next cluster)
 33770 00005880 89F8                    	MOV     AX,DI
 33771 00005882 52                              PUSH    DX
 33772                                  
 33773                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33774                                  	;push	ax
 33775                                  	;;;
 33776                                  
 33777 00005883 E8AF07                  	call	PACK
 33778                                  
 33779                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33780                                  	;pop	ax
 33781 00005886 8B16[EC0A]              	mov	dx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33782 0000588A 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; next cluster (hw) to be released
 33783 0000588E 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax		 ; next cluster (lw) to be released
 33784                                  	;;;
 33785                                          
 33786 00005890 5A                      	POP     DX
 33787                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 33788                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33789 00005891 723F                    	jc	short RET12
 33790                                          
 33791 00005893 09D2                    	OR      DX,DX
 33792 00005895 751F                            JNZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; Was putting EOF mark
 33793                                  
 33794                                  ; 28/02/2024
 33795                                  %if 0
 33796                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1 ; MSDOS 3.3
 33797                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 33798                                  	CMP     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 33799                                          JZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; No
 33800                                          INC	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33801                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33802                                          MOV     BX,AX
 33803                                          dec     ax              	; check for "1"
 33804                                  	jz	short RELEASE_flush	; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33805                                  %else
 33806                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33807                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33808                                  	;;;
 33809 00005897 3B16[EA0A]              	cmp	dx,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; > 0 ? (delete, release)
 33810 0000589B 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC	; no, EOF (allocate, -1), (dx = 0)
 33811                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 33812 0000589D 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 33813                                  					; Free count valid?
 33814 000058A2 7412                    	jz	short NO_DEALLOC	; No (dx = 0)
 33815                                  relblks_ifc:
 33816                                  	;inc	word ptr es:[bp+1Fh]
 33817 000058A4 26FF461F                	inc	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 33818 000058A8 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33819                                  
 33820                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33821 000058AA 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx
 33822 000058AE 7513                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2	; not FAT32
 33823                                  
 33824                                  	;inc	word [es:bp+21h]
 33825 000058B0 26FF4621                	inc	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 33826 000058B4 EB0D                    	jmp	short NO_DEALLOC2
 33827                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 33828                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 33829 000058B6 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx	; dx is -1 or 0
 33830                                  					; (valid 16 bit fat size is another number)
 33831 000058BA 7507                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2 ; FAT (FAT16 or FAT12)
 33832                                  					; dx = 0, FAT32
 33833                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh
 33834 000058BC 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh
 33835 000058C1 75E1                    	jnz	short relblks_ifc
 33836                                  NO_DEALLOC2:
 33837 000058C3 833E[E80A]00            	cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 33838 000058C8 7503                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC3
 33839 000058CA 48                      	dec	ax			; check for "1"	
 33840 000058CB 7405                    	jz	short RET12		; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 33841                                  NO_DEALLOC3:
 33842                                  	;;;
 33843                                  %endif
 33844                                  
 33845 000058CD E88D06                  	call	IsEOF
 33846 000058D0 72A3                            JB	short RELEASE	; Carry clear if JMP not taken
 33847                                  
 33848                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33849                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33850                                  ; 28/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33851                                  %if 0
 33852                                  RELEASE_flush:
 33853                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33854                                  	mov	al,[es:bp]
 33855                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 33856                                  	push	si		; FLUSHBUF may trash these and we guarantee
 33857                                  	push	cx		;  them to be preserved.
 33858                                  	push	es
 33859                                  	push	bp
 33860                                  	call	FLUSHBUF	; commit buffers for this drive
 33861                                  	pop	bp
 33862                                  	pop	es
 33863                                  	pop	cx
 33864                                  	pop	si
 33865                                  %endif		; 28/02/2024
 33866                                  
 33867                                  RET12:
 33868 000058D2 C3                      	retn
 33869                                  
 33870                                  ;Break	<GETEOF -- Find the end of a file>
 33871                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33872                                  ;
 33873                                  ; Procedure Name : GETEOF
 33874                                  ;
 33875                                  ; Inputs:
 33876                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 33877                                  ;       BX = Cluster in a file
 33878                                  ;       DS = CS
 33879                                  ; Outputs:
 33880                                  ;       BX = Last cluster in the file
 33881                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33882                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 33883                                  ;
 33884                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33885                                  
 33886                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33887                                  %if 0
 33888                                  GETEOF:
 33889                                  	call	UNPACK
 33890                                          jc	short RET12
 33891                                          PUSH    BX
 33892                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33893                                  	call	IsEOF
 33894                                          POP     BX
 33895                                          JAE     short RET12
 33896                                          MOV     BX,DI
 33897                                          JMP     short GETEOF
 33898                                  %else
 33899                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33900                                  	;;;
 33901                                  GETEOF4:	; **
 33902 000058D3 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33903                                  GETEOF1:
 33904 000058D7 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 33905 000058D9 8916[F20A]              	mov	[CLUSTERS_HW],dx ; CLUSTERS_HW:DI = Cluster Count
 33906 000058DD 58                      	pop	ax
 33907 000058DE 5A                      	pop	dx
 33908 000058DF C3                      	retn
 33909                                  
 33910                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D7Ch
 33911                                  GETEOF:
 33912 000058E0 52                      	push	dx
 33913 000058E1 50                      	push	ax
 33914 000058E2 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx ; 0	; cluster count = 0
 33915 000058E4 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33916                                  GETEOF2:
 33917 000058E6 E89D06                  	call	UNPACK
 33918 000058E9 72EC                    	jc	short GETEOF1
 33919                                  		; CCONTENT_HW:DI = next cluster (cluster content)
 33920 000058EB 40                      	inc	ax
 33921 000058EC 7501                    	jnz	short GETEOF3
 33922 000058EE 42                      	inc	dx
 33923                                  GETEOF3:
 33924 000058EF FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33925 000058F3 53                      	push    bx
 33926                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33927 000058F4 8B1E[EC0A]              	mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 33928 000058F8 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33929 000058FC 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33930 000058FE E85C06                  	call	IsEOF
 33931                                  	;pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 33932 00005901 5B                      	pop	bx
 33933                                  	;jae	short GETEOF1   ; EOF
 33934 00005902 73CF                    	jae	short GETEOF4 ; ** ; 28/02/2024
 33935                                  	;mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW] ; not EOF
 33936                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 33937 00005904 5B                      	pop	bx	; * ; 28/02/2024
 33938 00005905 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 33939 00005907 EBDD                    	jmp	short GETEOF2   ; get next cluster
 33940                                  	;;;
 33941                                  %endif

 33984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33985                                  
 33986                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33987                                  	; DOSCODE:8E77h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 33988                                  
 33989                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33990                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9DB0h
 33991                                  
 33992                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8ED3h)
 33993                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8D92h)
 33994                                  
 33995                                  MAKEFCB:
 33996                                  ;hkn; SS override
 33997                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0
 33998 00005909 30D2                    	XOR	DL,DL		; Flag--not ambiguous file name
 33999                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34000 0000590B 368816[4E03]            	mov	[ss:SpaceFlag],dl ; 0
 34001                                  	;test	al,2
 34002 00005910 A802                    	test	AL,DRVBIT	; Use current drive field if default?
 34003 00005912 7503                    	JNZ	short DEFDRV
 34004                                  	;MOV	BYTE [ES:DI],0	; No - use default drive
 34005                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34006 00005914 268815                  	mov	[es:di],dl ; 0
 34007                                  DEFDRV:
 34008 00005917 47                      	INC	DI
 34009 00005918 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34010                                  	;test	al,4
 34011 0000591B A804                    	test	AL,NAMBIT	; Use current name fields as default?
 34012 0000591D 93                      	XCHG	AX,BX		; Save bits in BX
 34013 0000591E B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34014 00005920 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB	; If not, go fill with blanks
 34015 00005922 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34016 00005924 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; Don't fill any
 34017                                  FILLB:
 34018 00005926 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34019 00005928 B103                    	MOV	CL,3
 34020 0000592A F6C308                  	test	BL,EXTBIT	; Use current extension as default
 34021 0000592D 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB2
 34022 0000592F 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34023 00005931 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX
 34024                                  FILLB2:
 34025 00005933 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34026 00005935 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX		; Put zero in AX
 34027 00005936 AB                      	STOSW
 34028 00005937 AB                      	STOSW			; Initialize two words after to zero
 34029 00005938 83EF10                  	SUB	DI,16		; Point back at start
 34030                                  	;test	bl,1
 34031 0000593B F6C301                  	test	BL,SCANSEPARATOR; Scan off separators if not zero
 34032 0000593E 7409                    	JZ	short SKPSPC
 34033 00005940 E88800                  	CALL	SCANB		; Peel off blanks and tabs
 34034 00005943 E81E01                  	CALL	DELIM		; Is it a one-time-only delimiter?
 34035 00005946 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSCAN
 34036 00005948 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over the delimiter
 34037                                  SKPSPC:
 34038 00005949 E87F00                  	CALL	SCANB		; Always kill preceding blanks and tabs
 34039                                  NOSCAN:
 34040 0000594C E8EC00                  	CALL	GETLET
 34041 0000594F 761E                    	JBE	short NODRV	; Quit if termination character
 34042 00005951 803C3A                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],":"	; Check for potential drive specifier
 34043 00005954 7519                    	JNZ	short NODRV
 34044 00005956 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over colon
 34045 00005957 2C40                    	SUB	AL,"@"          ; Convert drive letter to drive number (A=1)
 34046 00005959 760F                    	JBE	short BADDRV	; Drive letter out of range
 34047                                  
 34048 0000595B 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34049 0000595C E8961E                  	call	GetVisDrv
 34050 0000595F 58                      	POP	AX
 34051 00005960 730A                    	JNC	short HAVDRV
 34052                                  
 34053                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34054                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34055                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34056 00005962 36803E[1006]1A          	CMP	byte [SS:DrvErr],error_not_DOS_disk ; 1Ah
 34057                                  					; if not FAT drive ;AN000;
 34058 00005968 7402                    	JZ	short HAVDRV		; assume ok	   ;AN000;
 34059                                  BADDRV:
 34060 0000596A B2FF                    	MOV	DL,-1
 34061                                  HAVDRV:
 34062 0000596C AA                      	STOSB			; Put drive specifier in first byte
 34063 0000596D 46                      	INC	SI
 34064 0000596E 4F                      	DEC	DI		; Counteract next two instructions
 34065                                  NODRV:
 34066 0000596F 4E                      	DEC	SI		; Back up
 34067 00005970 47                      	INC	DI		; Skip drive byte
 34068                                  
 34069                                  	;entry	NORMSCAN
 34070                                  NORMSCAN:
 34071 00005971 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34072 00005974 E82200                  	CALL	GETWORD 	; Get 8-letter file name
 34073 00005977 803C2E                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],"."
 34074 0000597A 7510                    	JNZ	short NODOT
 34075 0000597C 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over dot if present
 34076                                  
 34077                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34078                                  	;mov	cx,3
 34079 0000597D B103                    	mov	cl,3	; ch=0
 34080                                  
 34081                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34082                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34083                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID2 ; 100h ;AN000;
 34084                                  	; 10/06/2019
 34085 0000597F 36F606[1206]01          	test	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(DBCS_VOLID2>>8) ; 1
 34086 00005985 7402                    	JZ	short VOLOK				;AN000;
 34087 00005987 A4                      	MOVSB			; 2nd byte of DBCS	;AN000;
 34088                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34089                                  	;MOV	CX,2					;AN000;
 34090 00005988 49                      	dec	cx  ; cx=2
 34091                                  	;JMP	SHORT contvol				;AN000;
 34092                                  VOLOK:
 34093                                  	;MOV	CX,3		; Get 3-letter extension
 34094                                  contvol:
 34095 00005989 E81300                  	CALL	MUSTGETWORD
 34096                                  NODOT:
 34097 0000598C 88D0                    	MOV	AL,DL
 34098                                  
 34099                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34100                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],0FEFFh
 34101                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34102 0000598E 368026[1206]FE          	and	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],0FEh ; (~DBCS_VOLID2)>>8
 34103                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],~DBCS_VOLID2 ; ### BUG FIX ###
 34104                                  
 34105 00005994 C3                      	retn
 34106                                  
 34107                                  NONAM:
 34108 00005995 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34109 00005997 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34110 00005998 C3                      	retn
 34111                                  
 34112                                  GETWORD:
 34113 00005999 E89F00                  	CALL	GETLET		
 34114 0000599C 76F7                    	JBE	short NONAM	; Exit if invalid character
 34115 0000599E 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34116                                  
 34117                                  ;	UGH!!! Horrible bug here that should be fixed at some point:
 34118                                  ;	If the name we are scanning is longer than CX, we keep on reading!
 34119                                  
 34120                                  MUSTGETWORD:
 34121 0000599F E89900                  	CALL	GETLET
 34122                                  
 34123                                  ;	If spaceFlag is set then we allow spaces in a pathname
 34124                                  
 34125                                  ;IF NOT TABLELOOK
 34126                                  ;	JB	short FILLNAM  ; MSDOS 3.3
 34127                                  ;ENDIF
 34128 000059A2 750C                    	JNZ	short MustCheckCX
 34129                                  
 34130                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34131 000059A4 36F606[4E03]FF          	test	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0FFh
 34132 000059AA 7419                    	JZ	short FILLNAM
 34133 000059AC 3C20                    	CMP	AL," "
 34134 000059AE 7515                    	JNZ	short FILLNAM
 34135                                  
 34136                                  MustCheckCX:
 34137 000059B0 E3ED                    	JCXZ	MUSTGETWORD
 34138 000059B2 49                      	DEC	CX
 34139 000059B3 3C2A                    	CMP	AL,"*"          ; Check for ambiguous file specifier
 34140 000059B5 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSTAR
 34141 000059B7 B03F                    	MOV	AL,"?"
 34142 000059B9 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34143                                  NOSTAR:
 34144 000059BB AA                      	STOSB
 34145 000059BC 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?"
 34146 000059BE 75DF                    	JNZ	short MUSTGETWORD
 34147 000059C0 80CA01                  	OR	DL,1		; Flag ambiguous file name
 34148 000059C3 EBDA                    	JMP	short MUSTGETWORD
 34149                                  FILLNAM:
 34150 000059C5 B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34151 000059C7 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34152 000059C9 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34153 000059CA C3                      	retn
 34154                                  
 34155                                  SCANB:
 34156 000059CB AC                      	LODSB
 34157 000059CC E89D00                  	CALL	SPCHK
 34158 000059CF 74FA                    	JZ	short SCANB
 34159 000059D1 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34160                                  scanb_retn:
 34161 000059D2 C3                      	retn

 34163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34164                                  ;
 34165                                  ; Procedure Name : NameTrans
 34166                                  ;
 34167                                  ; NameTrans is used by FindPath to scan off an element of a path. We must
 34168                                  ; allow spaces in pathnames
 34169                                  ;
 34170                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI points to start of path element
 34171                                  ;   Outputs:	Name1 has unpacked name, uppercased
 34172                                  ;		ES = DOSGroup
 34173                                  ;		DS:SI advanced after name
 34174                                  ;   Registers modified: DI,AX,DX,CX
 34175                                  ;
 34176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34177                                  
 34178                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34179                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34180                                  
 34181                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34182                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9E7Ch
 34183                                  
 34184                                  NameTrans:
 34185                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34186 000059D3 36C606[4E03]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],1
 34187 000059D9 16                      	push	ss
 34188 000059DA 07                      	pop	es
 34189                                  
 34190                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 34191 000059DB BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 34192 000059DE 57                      	PUSH	DI
 34193                                  
 34194                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34195                                  %if 0
 34196                                  	MOV	AX,'  '	; 2020h
 34197                                  	MOV	CX,5
 34198                                  	STOSB
 34199                                  	REP	STOSW		; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34200                                  	XOR	AL,AL		; Set stuff for NORMSCAN
 34201                                  	MOV	DL,AL
 34202                                  %else
 34203                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34204                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34205                                  	;;;
 34206 000059DF B020                    	mov     al, 20h ; ' '
 34207 000059E1 B90B00                  	mov     cx, 11
 34208 000059E4 F3AA                    	rep stosb               ; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34209 000059E6 91                      	xchg    ax, cx
 34210 000059E7 99                      	cwd
 34211                                  	;;;
 34212                                  %endif
 34213                                  
 34214 000059E8 AA                      	STOSB
 34215 000059E9 5F                      	POP	DI
 34216                                  
 34217 000059EA E884FF                  	CALL	NORMSCAN
 34218                                  
 34219                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 34220 000059ED 36803E[4B05]E5          	CMP	byte [SS:NAME1],0E5H
 34221 000059F3 75DD                    	jnz	short scanb_retn
 34222 000059F5 36C606[4B05]05          	MOV	byte [SS:NAME1],5 ; Magic name translation
 34223 000059FB C3                      	retn
 34224                                  
 34225                                  ;Break	<GETLET, DELIM -- CHECK CHARACTERS AND CONVERT>
 34226                                  ;============================================================================
 34227                                  
 34228                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34229                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34230                                  
 34231                                  ;If TableLook
 34232                                  
 34233                                  ;hkn; Table	SEGMENT
 34234                                  ;	PUBLIC	CharType
 34235                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34236                                  
 34237                                  ; Character type table for file name scanning
 34238                                  ; Table provides a mapping of characters to validity bits.
 34239                                  ; Four bits are provided for each character. Values 7Dh and above
 34240                                  ; have all bits set, so that part of the table is chopped off, and
 34241                                  ; the translation routine is responsible for screening these values.
 34242                                  ; The bit values are defined in DOSSYM.INC
 34243                                  
 34244                                  ;	      ; ^A and NUL
 34245                                  ;CharType:
 34246                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34247                                  ;	      ; ^C and ^B
 34248                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34249                                  ;	      ; ^E and ^D
 34250                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34251                                  ;	      ; ^G and ^F
 34252                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34253                                  ;	      ; TAB and BS
 34254                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34255                                  ;	      ; ^K and ^J
 34256                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34257                                  ;	      ; ^M and ^L
 34258                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34259                                  ;	      ; ^O and ^N
 34260                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34261                                  ;	      ; ^Q and ^P
 34262                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34263                                  ;	      ; ^S and ^R
 34264                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34265                                  ;	      ; ^U and ^T
 34266                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34267                                  ;	      ; ^W and ^V
 34268                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34269                                  ;	      ; ^Y and ^X
 34270                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34271                                  ;	      ; ESC and ^Z
 34272                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34273                                  ;	      ; ^] and ^;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34275                                  ;	      ; ^_ and ^^
 34276                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34277                                  ;	      ; ! and SPACE
 34278                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK)
 34279                                  ;	      ; # and "
 34280                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK)
 34281                                  ;	      ; $ - )
 34282                                  ;	 db   3 dup (0FFh)
 34283                                  ;	      ; + and *
 34284                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34285                                  ;	      ; - and '
 34286                                  ;	 db   NOT (FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM)
 34287                                  ;	      ; / and .
 34288                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34289                                  ;	      ; 0 - 9
 34290                                  ;	 db   5 dup (0FFh)
 34291                                  ;	      ; ; and :
 34292                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34293                                  ;	      ; = and <
 34294                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34295                                  ;	      ; ? and >
 34296                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34297                                  ;	      ; A - Z
 34298                                  ;	 db   13 dup (0FFh)
 34299                                  ;	      ; \ and [
 34300                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34301                                  ;	      ; ^ and ]
 34302                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34303                                  ;	      ; _ - {
 34304                                  ;	 db   15 dup (0FFh)
 34305                                  ;	      ; } and |
 34306                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34307

 34375                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34376                                  ; DOSCODE:8FB5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34377                                  
 34378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34379                                  ;
 34380                                  ; Procedure Names : GetLet, UCase, GetLet3
 34381                                  ;
 34382                                  ; These routines take a character, convert it to upper case, and check
 34383                                  ; for delimiters.  Three different entry points:
 34384                                  ;	GetLet -  DS:[SI] = character to convert
 34385                                  ;	UCase  -  AL = character to convert
 34386                                  ;	GetLet3 - AL = character
 34387                                  ;		  [BX] = translation table to use
 34388                                  ;
 34389                                  ;	Exit (in all cases) : AL = upper case character
 34390                                  ;			      CY set if char is control char other than TAB
 34391                                  ;			      ZF set if char is a delimiter
 34392                                  ;	Uses : AX, flags
 34393                                  ;
 34394                                  ; NOTE: This routine exists in a fast table lookup version, and a slow
 34395                                  ; inline version.  Return with carry set is only possible in the inline
 34396                                  ; version. The table lookup version is the one in use.
 34397                                  ;
 34398                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34399                                  
 34400                                  ; This entry point has character at [SI]
 34401                                  
 34402                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5517h
 34403                                  GETLET:	
 34404 00005A3B AC                      	LODSB
 34405                                  
 34406                                  ; This entry point has character in AL
 34407                                  
 34408                                  	;entry	UCase
 34409                                  UCase:	
 34410                                  	; 09/08/2018
 34411                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5518h
 34412                                  _UCase:
 34413 00005A3C 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34414 00005A3D BB[7E0B]                	MOV	BX,FILE_UCASE_TAB+2
 34415                                  
 34416                                  ; Convert the character in AL to upper case
 34417                                  
 34418                                  gl_0:
 34419 00005A40 3C61                    	CMP	AL,"a"
 34420 00005A42 7214                    	JB	short gl_2	; Already upper case, go check type
 34421 00005A44 3C7A                    	CMP	AL,"z"
 34422 00005A46 7702                    	JA	short gl_1
 34423 00005A48 2C20                    	SUB	AL,20H		; Convert to upper case
 34424                                  
 34425                                  ; Map European character to upper case
 34426                                  
 34427                                  gl_1:
 34428 00005A4A 3C80                    	CMP	AL,80H
 34429 00005A4C 720A                    	JB	short gl_2	; Not EuroChar, go check type
 34430 00005A4E 2C80                    	SUB	AL,80H		; translate to upper case with this index
 34431                                  
 34432                                  	; M048 - Start 
 34433                                  	; Lantastic call Ucase thru int 2f without setting SS to DOSDATA.
 34434                                  	; So we shall set up DS and to access FILE_UCASE_TAB in BX and also 
 34435                                  	; preserve it.
 34436                                  
 34437                                  	; 09/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34438                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34439                                  	;;XLAT	BYTE [CS:BX]	; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34440                                  	;CS	XLAT
 34441                                  
 34442                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34443                                  
 34444                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34445 00005A50 1E                      	push	ds
 34446                                  	;getdseg <ds>
 34447 00005A51 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 34448 00005A56 D7                      	XLAT			; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 34449 00005A57 1F                      	pop	ds
 34450                                  
 34451                                  	; M048 - End
 34452                                  
 34453                                  ; Now check the type
 34454                                  
 34455                                  ;If TableLook
 34456                                  gl_2:
 34457                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34458 00005A58 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34459                                  
 34460                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34461                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34462                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34463                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34464                                  	;cs	xlat	
 34465                                  	
 34466                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34467 00005A59 E81800                  	CALL	GetCharType	; returns type flags in AL
 34468                                  	
 34469                                  	;test	al,1	
 34470 00005A5C A801                    	TEST	AL,FCHK 	; test for normal character
 34471 00005A5E 58                      	POP	AX
 34472                                  
 34473 00005A5F 5B                      	POP	BX
 34474 00005A60 C3                      	RETN
 34475                                  
 34476                                  ; This entry has character in AL and lookup table in BX
 34477                                  
 34478                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34479                                  ;	;entry GetLet3
 34480                                  GETLET3: ; 10/08/2018
 34481 00005A61 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34482 00005A62 EBDC                    	JMP	short gl_0
 34483                                  ;ELSE
 34484                                  ;
 34485                                  ;gl_2:
 34486                                  ;	POP	BX
 34487                                  ;	CMP	AL,"."
 34488                                  ;	retz
 34489                                  ;	CMP	AL,'"'
 34490                                  ;	retz
 34491                                  ;	CALL	PATHCHRCMP
 34492                                  ;	retz
 34493                                  ;	CMP	AL,"["
 34494                                  ;	retz
 34495                                  ;	CMP	AL,"]"
 34496                                  ;	retz
 34497                                  ;ENDIF
 34498                                  
 34499                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------
 34500                                  ;
 34501                                  ; DELIM - check if character is a delimiter
 34502                                  ;	Entry : AX = character to check
 34503                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is not a delimiter
 34504                                  ;	Uses  : Flags
 34505                                  ;
 34506                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
 34507                                  
 34508                                  	;entry	DELIM
 34509                                  DELIM:
 34510                                  ;IF TableLook
 34511                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34512 00005A64 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34513                                  
 34514                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34515                                  	;push	bx
 34516                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34517                                  	;;09/08/2018
 34518                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34519                                  	;cs	xlat
 34520                                  	;pop	bx
 34521                                  
 34522                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34523 00005A65 E80C00                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34524                                  	
 34525                                  	;test	al,2
 34526 00005A68 A802                    	TEST	AL,FDELIM
 34527 00005A6A 58                      	POP	AX
 34528 00005A6B C3                      	RETN
 34529                                  ;ELSE
 34530                                  ;	CMP	AL,":"
 34531                                  ;	retz
 34532                                  ;
 34533                                  ;	CMP	AL,"<"
 34534                                  ;	retz
 34535                                  ;	CMP	AL,"|"
 34536                                  ;	retz
 34537                                  ;	CMP	AL,">"
 34538                                  ;	retz
 34539                                  ;
 34540                                  ;	CMP	AL,"+"
 34541                                  ;	retz
 34542                                  ;	CMP	AL,"="
 34543                                  ;	retz
 34544                                  ;	CMP	AL,";"
 34545                                  ;	retz
 34546                                  ;	CMP	AL,","
 34547                                  ;	retz
 34548                                  ;ENDIF
 34549                                  
 34550                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34551                                  ;
 34552                                  ;  SPCHK - checks to see if a character is a space or equivalent
 34553                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to check
 34554                                  ;	Exit  : ZF set if character is a space
 34555                                  ;	Uses  : flags
 34556                                  ;
 34557                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34558                                  
 34559                                  	;entry SPCHK
 34560                                  SPCHK:
 34561                                  ;IF TableLook
 34562                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34563 00005A6C 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34564                                  
 34565                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 34566                                  	;push	bx
 34567                                  	;mov	bx,CharType
 34568                                  	;; 09/08/2018
 34569                                  	;;xlat	byte [cs:bx]
 34570                                  	;cs	xlat
 34571                                  	;pop	bx
 34572                                  
 34573                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34574 00005A6D E80400                  	CALL	GetCharType
 34575                                  	
 34576                                  	;test	al,4
 34577 00005A70 A804                    	TEST	AL,FSPCHK
 34578 00005A72 58                      	POP	AX
 34579 00005A73 C3                      	RETN
 34580                                  ;ELSE
 34581                                  ;	CMP	AL,9		; Filter out tabs too
 34582                                  ;	retz
 34583                                  ;; WARNING! " " MUST be the last compare
 34584                                  ;	CMP	AL," "
 34585                                  ;	return
 34586                                  ;ENDIF
 34587                                  
 34588                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34589                                  ;
 34590                                  ;  GetCharType - return flag bits indicating character type
 34591                                  ;	Bits are defined in DOSSYM.INC. Uses lookup table
 34592                                  ;	defined above at label CharType.
 34593                                  ;
 34594                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to return type flags for
 34595                                  ;	Exit  : AL = type flags
 34596                                  ;	Uses  : AL, flags
 34597                                  ;
 34598                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34599                                  
 34600                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34601                                  
 34602                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34603                                  
 34604                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34605                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34606                                  
 34607                                  GetCharType:
 34608                                  	;cmp	al,7Eh
 34609 00005A74 3C7E                    	cmp	al,CharType_last 	; beyond end of table?
 34610 00005A76 7314                    	jae	short gct_90		; return standard value
 34611                                  
 34612 00005A78 53                      	push	bx
 34613 00005A79 BB[FC59]                	mov	bx,CharType		; load lookup table
 34614 00005A7C D0E8                    	shr	al,1			; adjust for half-byte table entry size
 34615                                  	;xlat	cs:[bx] 		; get flags
 34616 00005A7E 2ED7                    	cs	xlat	
 34617 00005A80 5B                      	pop	bx
 34618                                  
 34619                                  ; carry clear from previous shift means we want the low nibble.  Otherwise
 34620                                  ; we have to shift the flags down to the low nibble
 34621                                  
 34622 00005A81 7306                    	jnc	short gct_80		; carry clear, no shift needed
 34623                                  
 34624                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34625                                  %if 0
 34626                                  	shr	al,1			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34627                                  	shr	al,1
 34628                                  	shr	al,1
 34629                                  	shr	al,1
 34630                                  %else
 34631                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34632                                  	;;;
 34633 00005A83 51                      	push	cx
 34634 00005A84 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 34635 00005A86 D2E8                    	shr	al,cl
 34636 00005A88 59                      	pop	cx
 34637                                  	;;;
 34638                                  %endif
 34639                                  
 34640                                  gct_80:
 34641 00005A89 240F                    	and	al,0Fh			; clear the unused nibble
 34642 00005A8B C3                      	retn
 34643                                  gct_90:
 34644 00005A8C B00F                    	mov	al,0Fh			; set all flags
 34645 00005A8E C3                      	retn
 34646                                  
 34647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34648                                  ;
 34649                                  ; Procedure : PATHCHRCMP
 34650                                  ;
 34651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34652                                  
 34653                                  PATHCHRCMP:
 34654 00005A8F 3C2F                    	CMP	AL,'/'
 34655 00005A91 7606                    	JBE	short PathRet
 34656 00005A93 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 34657 00005A95 C3                      	retn
 34658                                  GotFor:
 34659 00005A96 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 34660 00005A98 C3                      	retn
 34661                                  PathRet:
 34662 00005A99 74FB                    	JZ	short GotFor
 34663 00005A9B C3                      	retn

 34669                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34670                                  ; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34671                                  
 34672                                  ; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11, CTRLC.ASM, 1983)
 34673                                  
 34674                                  ;**	MSCTRLC.ASM - ^C and error handler for MSDOS
 34675                                  
 34676                                  ;	TITLE	Control C detection, Hard error and EXIT routines
 34677                                  ;	NAME	IBMCTRLC
 34678                                  
 34679                                  ;**	Low level routines for detecting special characters on CON input,
 34680                                  ;	the ^C exit/int code, the Hard error INT 24 code, the
 34681                                  ;	process termination code, and the INT 0 divide overflow handler.
 34682                                  ;
 34683                                  ;	FATAL
 34684                                  ;	FATAL1
 34685                                  ;	reset_environment
 34686                                  ;	DSKSTATCHK
 34687                                  ;	SPOOLINT
 34688                                  ;	STATCHK
 34689                                  ;	CNTCHAND
 34690                                  ;	DIVOV
 34691                                  ;	CHARHARD
 34692                                  ;	HardErr
 34693                                  ;
 34694                                  ;	Revision history:
 34695                                  ;
 34696                                  ;	    AN000	version 4.0   Jan 1988
 34697                                  ;	    A002	PTM    -- dir >lpt3 hangs
 34698                                  ;	    A003	PTM 3957- fake version for IBMCAHE.COM
 34699                                  ;
 34700                                  ; 	M011: NEC's 8086 clone chip uses Intel's undocumented bit number in
 34701                                  ;	      flags register. In order to return to user normally DOS used to
 34702                                  ;	      move F202 into flags, which sets bit number 1 in flags uncondit-
 34703                                  ;	      ionally. Now it is modified to maintain the state of bit 1.
 34704                                  ;
 34705                                  ; 	M024: suppressed fail and ignore options if not in the middle of int 
 34706                                  ;	      24 and if Ctrl P or ctrl printscrn is pressed in routine 
 34707                                  ;	      charhard.
 34708                                  
 34709                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34710                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34711                                  ;		public	LowInt23Addr		
 34712                                  LowInt23Addr: ;	LABEL	DWORD
 34713 00005A9C [CA0F]0000              	DW	LowInt23, 0
 34714
